  8821                                  ;============================================================================
  8822                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8823                                  ;============================================================================
  8824                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8825                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8826                                  
  8827                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8828                                  
  8829                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8830                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8831                                  
  8832                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8833                                   
  8834                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8835                                  
  8836                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8837                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8838                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8839                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8840                                  
  8841                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8842 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8843 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8844                                  
  8845                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8846                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8847                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8848                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8849                                  
  8850                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8851                                  
  8852                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8853                                  
  8854                                  ;************************************************************************
  8855                                  ;*									*
  8856                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8857                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8858                                  ;*									*
  8859                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8860                                  ;*									*
  8861                                  ;************************************************************************
  8862                                  
  8863                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8864                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8865                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8866                                  
  8867                                  _seg_reinit:
  8868 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8869                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8870                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8871 00000037 BF[B606]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8872                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8873                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8874                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8875 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8876                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8877 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8878 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8879 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8880 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8881                                  
  8882                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8883                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8884                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8885                                  		
  8886                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8887 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8888                                  		
  8889 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8890                                  
  8891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8892                                  
  8893                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8894                                  
  8895                                  ;************************************************************************
  8896                                  ;*									*
  8897                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8898                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8899                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8900                                  ;*									*
  8901                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8902                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8903                                  ;*									*
  8904                                  ;************************************************************************
  8905                                  
  8906                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8907 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8908 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8909 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8910 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8911 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8912 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8913 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8914 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8915 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8916 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8917 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8918                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8919                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8920 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8921                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8922 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8923                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8924 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8925 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8926 00000061 8826[E004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8927                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8928 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8929 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8930 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8931 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8932 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8933                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8934 00000079 81FE[3505]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8935                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8936                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8937                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8938 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8939                                  
  8940                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8941                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8942                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8943                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8944                                  ;
  8945                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8946                                  ;
  8947                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8948                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8949                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8950                                  ;
  8951                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8952                                  
  8953                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8954                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8955 0000007F C706[1C05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8956 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8957 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8958 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8959                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8960                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8961 0000008E 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8962 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8963                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8964                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8965 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8966 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8967 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8968 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8969 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8970 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8971 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8972 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8973 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8974 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8975                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8976 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8977                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8978 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8979 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8980                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8981                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8982                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8983                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8984 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8985                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8986 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8987 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8988                                  					; mark operation complete
  8989 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8990 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8991 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8992 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8993 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8994 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8995 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8996 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8997 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8998                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8999                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  9000 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  9001 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  9002                                  
  9003                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  9004                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  9005                                  bc_retf:
  9006 000000CA CB                      		retf
  9007                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9008                                  
  9009                                  command_error:				
  9010 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  9011 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  9012                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9013                                  ; 01/05/2019
  9014                                  
  9015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9016                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  9017                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  9018                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  9019                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  9020                                  ; high.
  9021                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9022                                  
  9023                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  9024                                  
  9025                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  9026                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  9027                                  		; 15/10/2022
  9028                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  9029                                  
  9030 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  9031                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  9032                                  		
  9033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9034                                  
  9035                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  9036                                  
  9037                                  bc_cmderr:				
  9038 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  9039                                  					; unknown command error
  9040                                  
  9041                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9042                                  
  9043                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  9044                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  9045                                  
  9046                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  9047                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  9048                                  
  9049                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  9050                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  9051                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9052 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9053 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  9054                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  9055 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  9056 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  9057 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  9058                                  
  9059                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9060                                  
  9061                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  9062                                  
  9063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9064                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  9065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9066                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9067                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9068                                  
  9069                                  ; 30/04/2019
  9070                                  
  9071                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  9072                                  
  9073                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  9074                                  
  9075                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9076                                  
  9077                                  ;************************************************************************
  9078                                  ;*									*
  9079                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  9080                                  ;*									*
  9081                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  9082                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  9083                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  9084                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  9085                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  9086                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  9087                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  9088                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  9089                                  ;*									*
  9090                                  ;************************************************************************
  9091                                  
  9092                                  		; 20/09/2023
  9093                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  9094                                  		; 13/12/2022
  9095 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  9096                                  
  9097                                  		; 13/12/2022
  9098 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  9099                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  9100 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  9101                                  					; 00 init
  9102 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  9103 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  9104 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  9105                                  					; 03
  9106 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  9107                                  					; 04
  9108 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  9109                                  					; 05
  9110 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  9111 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  9112                                  					; 07
  9113 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  9114                                  					; 08
  9115 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  9116 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  9117                                  con_table_end:
  9118 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  9119                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  9120 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  9121 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  9122 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  9123 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  9124 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  9125                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  9126 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  9127                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  9128 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  9129 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  9130 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  9131 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  9132 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  9133 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  9134 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  9135 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  9136 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  9137 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  9138 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  9139 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  9140 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  9141 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  9142 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  9143 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  9144 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  9145 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  9146 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  9147 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  9148                                  prn_table_end:
  9149 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  9150                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  9151 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  9152 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  9153 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  9154 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  9155 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  9156 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  9157 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  9158 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  9159 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  9160 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  9161 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  9162                                  aux_table_end:
  9163 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  9164                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  9165 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  9166 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  9167 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  9168 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  9169 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  9170 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  9171 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  9172 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  9173 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  9174 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  9175                                  tim_table_end:
  9176                                  
  9177                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9178                                  
  9179                                  ;************************************************************************
  9180                                  ;*									*
  9181                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  9182                                  ;*									*
  9183                                  ;************************************************************************
  9184                                  
  9185                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  9186                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  9187 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  9188                                  con_loop:				
  9189 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  9190 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  9191 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  9192                                  con_exit:				
  9193 00000164 F8                      		clc
  9194 00000165 C3                      		retn
  9195                                  
  9196                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9197                                  
  9198                                  ;************************************************************************
  9199                                  ;*									*
  9200                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  9201                                  ;*									*
  9202                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  9203                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  9204                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  9205                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  9206                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  9207                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  9208                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  9209                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  9210                                  ;*									*
  9211                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  9212                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  9213                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9214                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  9215                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9216                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  9217                                  ;*									*
  9218                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  9219                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  9220                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  9221                                  ;*									*
  9222                                  ;************************************************************************
  9223                                  
  9224                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9225                                  chrin:		
  9226 00000166 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  9227 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9228 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  9229 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9230 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  9231 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9232 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9233 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  9234 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9235 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  9236 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  9237 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  9238                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9239                                  
  9240                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  9241                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  9242                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  9243                                  ;	 goto keyret
  9244                                  ;      else
  9245                                  ;	 set al to zero
  9246                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  9247                                  ;      endif
  9248                                  ;    endif
  9249                                  ;  endif
  9250                                  
  9251                                  alt_ext_chk:
  9252 00000183 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  9253 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  9254 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  9255 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  9256 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  9257 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  9258 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9259 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  9260                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9261                                  
  9262                                  not_ext:				
  9263 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  9264 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  9265                                  alt_save:				
  9266 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  9267                                  keyret:					
  9268 0000019E C3                      		retn
  9269                                  
  9270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9271                                  
  9272                                  ;************************************************************************
  9273                                  ;*									*
  9274                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  9275                                  ;*									*
  9276                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  9277                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  9278                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  9279                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  9280                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  9281                                  ;*									*
  9282                                  ;************************************************************************
  9283                                  
  9284                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9285                                  con_rdnd:				
  9286 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  9287 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9288 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9289 000001A6 8A26[DF04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  9290 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9291 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  9292 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  9293 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9294 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9295                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9296 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  9297                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  9298 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9299 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  9300 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  9301 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  9302                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  9303                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  9304                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  9305                                  z_bus_exit:				
  9306 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  9307 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  9308 000001CA C3                      		retn
  9309                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9310                                  
  9311                                  gotchr:					
  9312 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9313 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  9314 000001CF 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  9315 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9316 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  9317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9318                                  
  9319                                  notbrk:					
  9320 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9321 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  9322 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  9323 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  9324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9325                                  
  9326                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  9327 000001E0 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  9328 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  9329 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  9330 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9331 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  9332 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  9333 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  9334                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  9335                                  rdexit:					
  9336 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9337 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  9338                                  					; return keyboard character here
  9339                                  bc_exvec:				
  9340 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  9341                                  					; indicate normal termination
  9342 000001FB C3                      		retn
  9343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9344                                  
  9345                                  ;************************************************************************
  9346                                  ;*									*
  9347                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  9348                                  ;*									*
  9349                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  9350                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  9351                                  ;*									*
  9352                                  ;************************************************************************
  9353                                  
  9354                                  con_writ:
  9355                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  9356 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  9357                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9358                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  9359                                  con_lp:					
  9360 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  9361 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  9362 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  9363                                  					; AL = character to display
  9364 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  9365                                  cc_ret:					
  9366 00000206 F8                      		clc
  9367 00000207 C3                      		retn
  9368                                  
  9369                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9370                                  
  9371                                  ;************************************************************************
  9372                                  ;*									*
  9373                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  9374                                  ;*									*
  9375                                  ;************************************************************************
  9376                                  
  9377                                  con_flush:
  9378 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  9379                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  9380 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9381 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  9382                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  9383                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  9384                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  9385 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  9386 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9387 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  9388                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  9389 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  9390                                  
  9391                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9392                                  
  9393                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9394                                  
  9395                                  ;************************************************************************
  9396                                  ;*									*
  9397                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  9398                                  ;*									*
  9399                                  ;************************************************************************
  9400                                  
  9401                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  9402                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  9403                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  9404                                  
  9405                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  9406                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  9407                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  9408                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  9409                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  9410                                  ;
  9411                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  9412                                  
  9413                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9414                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  9415                                  
  9416                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9417                                  
  9418                                  ;************************************************************************
  9419                                  ;*									*
  9420                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  9421                                  ;*									*
  9422                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  9423                                  ;*									*
  9424                                  ;************************************************************************
  9425                                  
  9426                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  9427 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  9428                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  9429                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9430                                  prn_done:
  9431 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  9432 0000021D C3                      		retn
  9433                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9434                                  
  9435                                  ;************************************************************************
  9436                                  ;*									*
  9437                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  9438                                  ;*									*
  9439                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  9440                                  ;*									*
  9441                                  ;************************************************************************
  9442                                  
  9443                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  9444                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  9445 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  9446                                  prn_loop:				
  9447 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  9448                                  prn_out:				
  9449 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9450 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  9451 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  9452 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9453 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  9454 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  9455 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  9456 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  9457 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  9458 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  9459 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  9460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9461                                  
  9462                                  _prnwf:					
  9463 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  9464 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  9465                                  TestPrnError:				
  9466 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  9467 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  9468                                  pmessg:					
  9469 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  9471                                  
  9472                                  prn_con:

  9474 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  9475                                  ;prn_done:				
  9476                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9477                                  prn_done2:

  9479                                  		; cf=0
  9480 0000024E C3                      		retn

  9482                                  
  9483                                  ;************************************************************************
  9484                                  ;*									*
  9485                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  9486                                  ;*									*
  9487                                  ;************************************************************************
  9488                                  
  9489                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  9490 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  9491 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  9492 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  9493                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  9494                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9496 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit

  9498                                  
  9499                                  ;************************************************************************
  9500                                  ;*									*
  9501                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  9502                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  9503                                  ;*									*
  9504                                  ;************************************************************************
  9505                                  
  9506                                  prnstat:				
  9507 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  9508                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  9509                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  9510                                  					; Return: AH = status
  9511                                  
  9512                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9513                                  
  9514                                  ;************************************************************************
  9515                                  ;*									*
  9516                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  9517                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  9518                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  9519                                  ;*									*
  9520                                  ;************************************************************************
  9521                                  
  9522                                  prnop:	
  9523 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  9524 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  9525                                  
  9526                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  9527                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  9528                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  9529                                  
  9530 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  9531 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  9532 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  9533 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  9534 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  9535 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  9536 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  9537                                  
  9538                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  9539                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  9540                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  9541                                  
  9542                                  NextTest:				
  9543 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  9544                                  					; i/o error?
  9545 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  9546                                  
  9547                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  9548                                  
  9549 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  9550                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  9551 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  9552 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  9553 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  9554                                  ret1:					
  9555 00000282 C3                      		retn
  9556                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9557                                  
  9558                                  checknotready:				
  9559 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  9560 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  9561 00000288 C3                      		retn
  9562                                  
  9563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9564                                  
  9565                                  ;************************************************************************
  9566                                  ;*									*
  9567                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  9568                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  9569                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  9570                                  ;*									*
  9571                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  9572                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  9573                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  9574                                  ;*									*
  9575                                  ;************************************************************************
  9576                                  
  9577                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9578                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  9579 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  9580                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  9581 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  9582 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  9583 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9584 0000028F 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9585 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9586                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  9587 00000295 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9588 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  9589                                  prn_getstat:				
  9590 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9591 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  9592 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  9593 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  9594 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  9595 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  9596 000002A7 26                      		es
  9597 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  9598                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  9599                                  					; lodsb
  9600 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9601 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  9602 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  9603 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  9604                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9605                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  9606                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  9607 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  9608                                  
  9609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9610                                  
  9611                                  prn_bperr:				
  9612 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  9613                                  prn_berr:				
  9614 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9616                                  
  9617                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9618                                  
  9619                                  ;************************************************************************
  9620                                  ;*									*
  9621                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  9622                                  ;*									*
  9623                                  ;************************************************************************
  9624                                  
  9625                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  9626                                  ; 11/01/2019
  9627                                  
  9628                                  ;********************************;*
  9629                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  9630                                  ;********************************;*
  9631                                  
  9632                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  9633                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  9634                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  9635                                  
  9636                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  9637                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  9638                                  ;;endstruc
  9639                                  
  9640                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  9641                                  
  9642                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9643                                  
  9644                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9645                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  9646 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  9647 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  9648                                  					; ioc_pc
  9649 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  9650                                  
  9651                                  prnfuncerr:				
  9652 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  9653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9654                                  
  9655                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  9656 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  9657 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  9658 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9659                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  9660 000002CF 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9661 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9662                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  9663 000002D5 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9664 000002D9 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  9665 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  9666 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  9667 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  9668 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  9669                                  prngetcount:				
  9670                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  9671 000002E4 898F[E104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  9672 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  9673                                  					; return current retry count
  9674                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9675                                  		; cf=0
  9676                                  		;clc
  9677 000002EB C3                      		retn
  9678                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9679                                  
  9680                                  ;************************************************************************
  9681                                  ;*									*

  9686

  9708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9709                                  
  9710                                  ;************************************************************************
  9711                                  ;*									*
  9712                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9713                                  ;*									*
  9714                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9715                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9716                                  ;*									*
  9717                                  ;************************************************************************
  9718                                  
  9719                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9720                                  
  9721                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9722                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9723                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9724                                  
  9725                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9726                                  
  9727                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9728                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9729                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9730                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9731                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9732                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9733                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9734                                  
  9735                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9736                                  
  9737                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9738                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9739                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9740                                  
  9741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9742                                  
  9743                                  ;************************************************************************
  9744                                  ;*									*
  9745                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9746                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9747                                  ;*									*
  9748                                  ;************************************************************************
  9749                                  
  9750                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9751                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9752 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9753 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9754 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9755 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9756 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9757 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9758                                  aux1:					
  9759 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9760                                  					; won't return if error
  9761                                  aux2:					
  9762 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  9763 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9764                                  exvec2:					
  9765 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9766                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9767 0000031B C3                      		retn
  9768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9769                                  
  9770                                  ;************************************************************************
  9771                                  ;*									*
  9772                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9773                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9774                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9775                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9776                                  ;*									*
  9777                                  ;************************************************************************
  9778                                  
  9779                                  auxin:					
  9780 0000031C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9781 0000031E E83A00                  		call	auxop
  9782 00000321 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9783                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9784                                  		;retn
  9785                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9786 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9788                                  
  9789                                  arbad:					
  9790 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9791                                  		;xor	al, al
  9792                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9793                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9794 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9795 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9796                                  
  9797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9798                                  
  9799                                  ;************************************************************************
  9800                                  ;*									*
  9801                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9802                                  ;*									*
  9803                                  ;************************************************************************
  9804                                  
  9805                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9806 0000032C E85200                  		call	getbx
  9807 0000032F 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9808 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9809 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9810 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9811 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9812 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9813 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9814 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9815 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9816 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9817                                  auxdrx:					
  9818 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9819                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9820                                  
  9821                                  auxbus:					
  9822 00000349 E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9823                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9824                                  
  9825                                  ;************************************************************************
  9826                                  ;*									*
  9827                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  9828                                  ;*									*
  9829                                  ;************************************************************************
  9830                                  
  9831                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  9833 0000034F A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9834 00000351 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9835 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9836 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9837                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9838                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9839                                  		;clc
  9840 00000358 C3                      		retn
  9841                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9842                                  
  9843                                  ;************************************************************************
  9844                                  ;*									*
  9845                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9846                                  ;*									*
  9847                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9848                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9849                                  ;*									*
  9850                                  ;************************************************************************
  9851                                  
  9852                                  auxstat:				
  9853 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9854                                  
  9855                                  		; fall into auxop
  9856                                  
  9857                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9858                                  
  9859                                  ;************************************************************************
  9860                                  ;*									*
  9861                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9862                                  ;*									*
  9863                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9864                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9865                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9866                                  ;*									*
  9867                                  ;************************************************************************
  9868                                  
  9869                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9870 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9871                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9872                                  					; get port number
  9873 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9874                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9875                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9876 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9877                                  
  9878                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9879                                  
  9880                                  ;************************************************************************
  9881                                  ;*									*
  9882                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9883                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9884                                  ;*									*
  9885                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9886                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9887                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9888                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9889                                  ;*									*
  9890                                  ;************************************************************************
  9891                                  
  9892                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9893 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9894 00000365 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9895                                  					; zero out buffer
  9896                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9897                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9898                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9899 00000368 C3                      		retn

  9920 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines

  9926                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return

  9928                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9929 00000380 C3                      		retn
