 12087 00000AB3 C3                      		retn
 12088                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12089                                  
 12090                                  block_floppy:
 12091                                  
 12092                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 12093                                  				
 12094 00000AB4 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12095                                  		;inc	cl
 12096                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12097 00000AB8 41                      		inc	cx
 12098 00000AB9 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 12099 00000ABD 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 12100 00000ABF 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 12101 00000AC1 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 12102 00000AC3 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 12103                                  gotmin:
 12104                                  
 12105                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 12106                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 12107                                  
 12108 00000AC5 50                      		push	ax
 12109 00000AC6 51                      		push	cx
 12110 00000AC7 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 12111 00000AC9 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 12112 00000ACC 59                      		pop	cx
 12113 00000ACD 58                      		pop	ax
 12114                                  
 12115                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 12116                                  
 12117 00000ACE 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 12118 00000AD0 D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 12119 00000AD2 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 12120 00000AD4 EBC6                    		jmp	short block
 12121                                  dskerr_brdg:
 12122 00000AD6 E9E700                  		jmp	dskerr
 12123                                  
 12124                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12125                                  
 12126                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12127                                  
 12128                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12129                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 12130                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 12131                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 12132                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 12133                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 12134                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 12135                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 12136                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12137                                  
 12138                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12139                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12140                                  Disk:
 12141                                  
 12142                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 12143                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 12144                                  
 12145 00000AD9 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 12146                                  					; set up retry count
 12147                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12148 00000ADC 268A4D23                		mov	cl, [es:di+23h]
 12149 00000AE0 83E101                  		and	cx, 1
 12150                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12151                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 12152 00000AE3 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12153 00000AE5 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 12154 00000AE8 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12155 00000AEA BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 12156                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 12157 00000AED 892E[2105]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 12158 00000AF1 892E[2305]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 12159 00000AF5 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 12160                                  ;retry:
 12161                                  ; 09/12/2022
 12162                                  _retry:
 12163 00000AF9 50                      		push	ax
 12164 00000AFA 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 12165                                  		
 12166                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12167 00000AFE E30B                    		jcxz	disk_not_mini
 12168                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12169                                  		;jz	short disk_not_mini
 12170                                  		
 12171 00000B00 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 12172                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 12173 00000B05 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 12174 00000B07 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 12175                                  					; add hidden trks.
 12176                                  disk_not_mini:
 12177 00000B0B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12178 00000B0D D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12179 00000B0F 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 12180 00000B13 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 12181 00000B15 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 12182 00000B17 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 12183 00000B1B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 12184                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12185 00000B1F 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 12186 00000B24 7411                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 12187                                  
 12188                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 12189                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 12190                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 12191                                  
 12192 00000B26 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12193                                  		;jz	short do_writej
 12194                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12195 00000B2B 7460                    		jz	short do_write
 12196 00000B2D 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 12197 00000B30 7405                    		jz	short do_fast
 12198 00000B32 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 12199                                  		;jz	short do_fast
 12200                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12201 00000B35 7556                    		jnz	short do_write
 12202                                  ;do_writej:
 12203                                  
 12204                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 12205                                  			
 12206                                  		;jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 12207                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12208                                  
 12209                                  do_fast:
 12210 00000B37 E8FB00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 12211                                  testerr:
 12212 00000B3A 729A                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 12213                                  
 12214                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 12215                                  
 12216 00000B3C 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 12217 00000B40 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12218                                  no_set:
 12219                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 12220 00000B44 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 12221 00000B4A 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 12222                                  noverify:
 12223 00000B4C 58                      		pop	ax
 12224                                  
 12225                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 12226                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 12227                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 12228                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 12229                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 12230                                  
 12231 00000B4D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12232                                  					; fnon_removable
 12233 00000B52 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 12234 00000B54 F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 12235 00000B59 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 12236                                  its_removable:
 12237 00000B5B 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 12238 00000B5E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12239 00000B60 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 12240 00000B64 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 12241 00000B66 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 12242 00000B6A 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12243                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 12244 00000B6E 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 12245 00000B70 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 12246 00000B75 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 12247 00000B79 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 12248 00000B7B 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 12249 00000B7F 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 12250 00000B81 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 12251 00000B83 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 12252                                  noxor:
 12253 00000B87 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 12254                                  disk_ret:
 12255 00000B8B F8                      		clc
 12256 00000B8C C3                      		retn
 12257                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12258                                  
 12259                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12260                                  
 12261                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12262                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 12263                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 12264                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12265                                  
 12266                                  do_write:
 12267 00000B8D 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 12268 00000B91 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 12269 00000B93 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12270 00000B97 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 12271                                  do_norm:
 12272 00000B99 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 12273 00000B9C EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 12274                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12275                                  
 12276                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12277                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 12278                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12279                                  
 12280                                  doverify:
 12281 00000B9E 58                      		pop	ax
 12282 00000B9F 50                      		push	ax
 12283 00000BA0 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 12284 00000BA2 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 12285 00000BA5 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 12286                                  
 12287                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 12288                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 12289                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 12290                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 12291                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 12292                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 12293                                  
 12294 00000BA7 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 12295 00000BAA 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 12296 00000BAC FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 12297 00000BB0 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 12298 00000BB2 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 12299 00000BB5 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 12300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12301                                  
 12302                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 12303 00000BB7 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 12304 00000BBA FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 12305 00000BBE EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 12306                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12307                                  
 12308                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12309                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 12310                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 12311                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12312                                  
 12313                                  dskerr:
 12314 00000BC0 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 12315 00000BC5 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 12316 00000BC7 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 12317                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 12318 00000BCA 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 12319 00000BCF 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 12320 00000BD1 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 12321 00000BD4 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 12322                                  dochkagain:
 12323 00000BD9 E8A900                  		call	again
 12324                                  dskerr0:
 12325 00000BDC 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 12326 00000BDE 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12327                                  					; fnon_removable
 12328 00000BE3 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 12329 00000BE5 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 12330 00000BE8 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 12331                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 12332 00000BEA 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 12333 00000BED 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 12334 00000BEF C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 12335                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 12336                                  dskerr1:
 12337 00000BF5 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 12338                                  		;jmp	retry
 12339                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12340 00000BF6 E900FF                  		jmp	_retry
 12341                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12342                                  
 12343                                  write_fault_err:
 12344 00000BF9 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 12345                                  					; for write fault error.
 12346 00000BFC EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 12347                                  
 12348                                  		; fall into harderr
 12349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12350                                  
 12351                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 12352                                  
 12353                                  harderr:
 12354 00000BFE E84C00                  		call	maperror
 12355                                  harderr2:
 12356 00000C01 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12357                                  					; force a media check through rom
 12358 00000C06 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 12359 00000C0A 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 12360                                  
 12361                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 12362                                  
 12363                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 12364                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12365 00000C0E E917FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 12366                                  
 12367                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12368                                  
 12369                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 12370                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 12371                                  
 12372                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12373                                  normspeed:
 12374 00000C11 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 12375 00000C16 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 12376 00000C18 06                      		push	es
 12377 00000C19 50                      		push	ax
 12378 00000C1A A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 12379 00000C1D C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 12380 00000C21 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12381 00000C25 58                      		pop	ax
 12382 00000C26 07                      		pop	es
 12383 00000C27 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 12384                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12385                                  		;push	es
 12386                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 12387                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12388                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 12389                                  		;pop	es
 12390 00000C2A 1E                      		push	ds
 12391 00000C2B C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12392 00000C2F C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 12393 00000C33 1F                      		pop	ds
 12394                                  
 12395 00000C34 C3                      		retn
 12396                                  
 12397                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12398                                  
 12399                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 12400                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 12401                                  
 12402                                  fastspeed:
 12403 00000C35 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 12404                                  					; ftoobig
 12405 00000C3A 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 12406 00000C3C 06                      		push	es
 12407 00000C3D 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12408 00000C41 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12409 00000C43 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 12410 00000C47 07                      		pop	es
 12411 00000C48 C3                      		retn
 12412                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12413                                  
 12414                                  notready:
 12415 00000C49 F9                      		stc
 12416 00000C4A B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 12417 00000C4C C3                      		retn
 12418                                  
 12419                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12420                                  
 12421                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 12422                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 12423                                  
 12424                                  maperror:
 12425 00000C4D 51                      		push	cx
 12426 00000C4E 06                      		push	es
 12427 00000C4F 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 12428 00000C50 07                      		pop	es
 12429 00000C51 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 12430 00000C53 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 12431                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 12432 00000C56 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 12433                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 12434 00000C59 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 12435 00000C5C F2AE                    		repne scasb
 12436                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12437                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 12438                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12439 00000C5E 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 12440                                  					; get translation
 12441                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 12442                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 12443 00000C61 07                      		pop	es
 12444 00000C62 59                      		pop	cx
 12445 00000C63 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 12446 00000C64 C3                      		retn
 12447                                  
 12448                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12449                                  
 12450                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 12451                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 12452                                  
 12453                                  set_tim:
 12454 00000C65 50                      		push	ax
 12455 00000C66 E8B2F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 12456                                  
 12457                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 12458                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 12459                                  
 12460 00000C69 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12461 00000C6D 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 12462 00000C6F 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12463                                  		;jz	short done_set
 12464                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12465 00000C73 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 12466                                  setaccess:
 12467 00000C75 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 12468 00000C7A 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12469 00000C7E 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12470                                  done_set:
 12471 00000C82 F8                      		clc
 12472                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 12473 00000C83 58                      		pop	ax
 12474 00000C84 C3                      		retn
 12475                                  
 12476                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12477                                  
 12478                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12479                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12480                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12481                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 12482                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 12483                                  
 12484                                  again:	
 12485 00000C85 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 12486 00000C88 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 12487 00000C8B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 12488                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12489 00000C8D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12490 00000C8E C3                      		retn
 12491                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12492                                  
 12493                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 12494 00000C8F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12495 00000C91 C3                      		retn

 12507                                  ;
 12508                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12509                                  ;
 12510                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12511                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12512                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12513                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12514                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12515                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12516                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12517                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 12518                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12519                                  
 12520                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 12521                                  
 12522                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12523                                  
 12524                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12525 00000C92 00                      		db 0
 12526                                  
 12527                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 12528                                  %if 0
 12529                                  
 12530                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 12531                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 12532                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	;gh ReadTrack
 12533                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 12534                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12535                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12536                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 12600                                  
 12601                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12602                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12603                                  ;
 12604                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12605                                  ;
 12606                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12607                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12608                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12609                                  ;
 12610                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12611                                  
 12612                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12613                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12614                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12615 00000CC2 E8A5F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12616 00000CC5 06                      		push	es
 12617 00000CC6 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12618 00000CCA 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12619                                  					; RAWIO
 12620 00000CCF 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12621 00000CD3 07                      		pop	es
 12622 00000CD4 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12623                                  
 12624                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12625                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12626                                  
 12627                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12628 00000CD6 BE[930C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12629                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12630                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12631 00000CD9 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12632 00000CDB 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12633                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12634 00000CDD BE[A60C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12635                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12636                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12637                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12638 00000CE0 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12639 00000CE2 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12640 00000CE4 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12641 00000CE7 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12642 00000CE9 98                      		cbw
 12643 00000CEA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12644 00000CEC 46                      		inc	si
 12645 00000CED 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12646 00000CEF 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12647                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12648 00000CF2 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12649                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12650                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12651 00000CF7 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12652 00000CF9 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12654                                  
 12655                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12656                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12657                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 12658 00000CFA 5A                      		pop	dx
 12659

 12667                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:

 12669                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 12670                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 12671                                  ;
 12672                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 12673                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 12674                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 12675                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG

 12679                                  GetDeviceParameters:

 12681

 12695                                  					
 12696                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 12697 00000D22 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]

 12711                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead

 12897                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12898                                  
 12899                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12900                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12901                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12902                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12903                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12904                                  ;
 12905                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12906                                  ;
 12907                                  ; output:
 12908                                  ;	for status call:
 12909                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12910                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12911                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12912                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12913                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12914                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12915                                  ;
 12916                                  ;	for format track:
 12917                                  ;		carry set if error
 12918                                  ;
 12919                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12920                                  
 12921                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12922                                  
 12923                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12924                                  FormatTrack:
 12925 00000E1C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12926 00000E20 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 12927 00000E23 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12928                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 12929 00000E26 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 12930 00000E28 1E                      		push	ds
 12931                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12932 00000E29 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12933                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12934 00000E2E E82302                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 12935 00000E31 1F                      		pop	ds

 13072                                  
 13073                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 13074                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 13075                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 13076                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 13077                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 13078                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 13079                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 13080                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 13081                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 13083                                  		; register.

 13186                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13187                                  
 13188                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13189                                  
 13190                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13191                                  ;
 13192                                  ; TrackIo:
 13193                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 13194                                  ;
 13195                                  ;   input:
 13196                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 13197                                  ;		  3 = write
 13198                                  ;		  4 = verify
 13199                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 13200                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 13201                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 13202                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 13203                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 13204                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 13205                                  ;
 13206                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13207                                  
 13208                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13209                                  		
 13210                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13211                                  TrackIo:	
 13212                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 13213 00000F74 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 13214 00000F78 E84EF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 13215 00000F7B 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13216                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 13217 00000F80 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 13218 00000F82 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 13219 00000F83 51                      		push	cx
 13220 00000F84 E8CEFA                  		call	iosetup
 13221 00000F87 59                      		pop	cx
 13222 00000F88 58                      		pop	ax
 13223                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 13224 00000F89 BE[2A05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 13225 00000F8C D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13226 00000F8E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13227 00000F90 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 13228                                  
 13229                                  		; WE WANT:
 13230                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 13231                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 13232                                  		
 13233 00000F92 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 13234                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13235 00000F95 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 13236                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13237                                  					; good_tracklayout
 13238 00000F9A 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 13239                                  		
 13240 00000F9C 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 13241                                  ionextsector:				
 13242 00000F9E 51                      		push	cx
 13243 00000F9F 52                      		push	dx
 13244 00000FA0 46                      		inc	si
 13245 00000FA1 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 13246                                  					; the track table
 13247 00000FA2 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 13248 00000FA3 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 13249                                  
 13250                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 13251                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 13252                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 13253                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 13254                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 13255                                  		
 13256                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13257 00000FA6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1

 13259                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 13260 00000FAB 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 13261                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13262 00000FAD F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 13263                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 13264                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 13265 00000FB2 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 13266 00000FB4 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 13267 00000FB8 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 13268 00000FBA E81CFB                  		call	Disk
 13269 00000FBD 5A                      		pop	dx
 13270 00000FBE 59                      		pop	cx
 13271 00000FBF F8                      		clc
 13272 00000FC0 C3                      		retn
 13273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13274                                  
 13275                                  IoRemovable:				
 13276 00000FC1 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 13277                                  					; table	and save it
 13278 00000FC2 50                      		push	ax
 13279 00000FC3 56                      		push	si
 13280 00000FC4 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 13281 00000FC5 50                      		push	ax

 13283                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data

 13286 00000FD1 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 13287 00000FD4 58                      		pop	ax
 13288 00000FD5 1F                      		pop	ds

 13290 00000FD8 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 13291 00000FDB E8FBFA                  		call	Disk

 13293                                  					; sector size
 13294                                  		;pop	ax

 13296 00000FDF 59                      		pop	cx
 13297                                  
 13298                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13299                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 13300                                  		;mov	cl, al	; 24/12/2023
 13301 00000FE0 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 13302 00000FE3 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 13303                                  
 13304 00000FE5 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 13305 00000FE7 5A                      		pop	dx
 13306 00000FE8 59                      		pop	cx

 13308 00000FEB 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 13310                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13311 00000FF0 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 13312 00000FF2 E829FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 13313                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 13314                                  NoNeedDone:

 13316                                  NoNeedDone2:

 13318                                  
 13319                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13320                                  
 13321                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13322                                  ;
 13323                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 13324                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 13325                                  ; are permissible.
 13326                                  ;
 13327                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 13328                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 13329                                  ; All other registers preserved
 13330                                  ;
 13331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13361                                  ;
 13362                                  ; SetDASD
 13363                                  ;
 13364                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 13365                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 13366                                  ;
 13367                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 13368                                  ;
 13369                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13370                                  
 13371                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13372                                  SetDasd:
 13373 00000FF7 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 13374                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 13375 00000FFC 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 13376                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13377 00000FFE 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 13378                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13379                                  					; set_dasd_true
 13380 00001003 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 13381                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13382 00001005 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 13383                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 13445                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13446                                  
 13447                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13448                                  
 13449                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13450                                  ;
 13451                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13452                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13453                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13454                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13455                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13456                                  ;
 13457                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13458                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13459                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13460                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13461                                  ;
 13462                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13463                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13464                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13465                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13466                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13467                                  ;
 13468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13469                                  
 13470                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13471                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13472 00001054 51                      		push	cx
 13473 00001055 52                      		push	dx
 13474                                  
 13475                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13476                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13477                                  
 13478 00001056 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13479 0000105B 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13480 0000105D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13481 0000105F 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13482 00001064 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13483 00001066 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13484                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13485                                  
 13486                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13487 00001068 06                      		push	es
 13488 00001069 56                      		push	si
 13489                                  
 13490                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13491                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors

 13493 0000106C 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13494                                  
 13495 0000106E 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13496                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13497                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13498 00001073 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13499 00001077 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13500

 13502                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13503

 13509 00001086 49                      		dec	cx

 13512 0000108C D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1

 13514 00001090 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13515 00001094 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13516 00001098 06                      		push	es
 13517 00001099 1E                      		push	ds
 13518 0000109A 56                      		push	si
 13519 0000109B 57                      		push	di
 13520 0000109C B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13521 0000109E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13522                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13523 000010A0 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13524 000010A2 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13525 000010A7 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13526 000010A9 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13527                                  
 13528                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13529                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13530 000010AA 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13531 000010AC 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13532 000010AE 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13533                                  
 13534 000010AF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13535                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13536                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13537 000010B4 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si

 13539

 13542                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 13543                                  		;mov	es, si

 13607                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13608                                  ;
 13609                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13610                                  ;
 13611                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13612                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13613                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13614                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13615                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 13616                                  ;
 13617                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13629                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 13635                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 13645                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13646                                  ;
 13647                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13648                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13649                                  ;
 13650                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13651                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13652                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13653                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13654                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13655                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13656                                  ;
 13657                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13658                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13659                                  ;
 13660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13661                                  
 13662                                  		; 24/12/2023

 13664                                  ToRom:

 13719                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13720                                  
 13721                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13722                                  
 13723                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13724                                  ;
 13725                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13726                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13727                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13728                                  ;
 13729                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13730                                  
 13731                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13732                                  ioctl_getown:
 13733 00001154 E813F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13734 00001157 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13735                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13736 0000115B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13737                                  ownloop:				
 13738 0000115F 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13739 00001163 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13740                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13741 00001165 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13742                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13743                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13744 0000116A 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13745                                  getnextBDS:				
 13746 0000116C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13747 0000116F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13748                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13749                                  
 13750                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13751                                  ;
 13752                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13753                                  ; in al to al.
 13754                                  ;
 13755                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13756                                  
 13757                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13758                                  ioctl_setown:
 13759 00001171 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13760 00001174 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13761                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13762 00001179 E84DF7                  		call	checksingle
 13763                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13764 0000117C FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13765                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13766                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13767                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13768                                  
 13769                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13770                                  ;
 13771                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13772                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13773                                  ;
 13774                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13775

 13777 00001180 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13778                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13779 00001182 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13780                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13781                                  					; fi_am_mult

 13785                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13786 0000118D FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13787                                  exitnomult:				
 13788 0000118F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]

 13790                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13791                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13792                                  		; cf=0
 13793                                  		;clc
 13794 00001196 C3                      		retn

 13803                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.

 13853                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13854                                  ;	get media id
 13855                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13856                                  ;
 13857                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13858                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13859                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13860                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13861                                  ;
 13862                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13863                                  ;
 13864                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13865                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13866                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13867                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13868                                  ;
 13869                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13870                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13871                                  ;
 13872                                  ; LOGIC:
 13873                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13874                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13875                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13876                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13877                                  ;
 13878                                  ; {
 13879                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13880                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13881                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13882                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13883                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13884                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13885                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13886                                  ;		};
 13887                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13888                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13889                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13890                                  ;		};
 13891                                  ;	else
 13892                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13893                                  ;
 13894                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13895                                  
 13896                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13897                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13898                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13899                                  
 13900                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13901                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13902                                  GetMediaId:
 13903 000011BF E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13904 000011C2 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13905 000011C6 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13906 000011CB E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13907 000011CE 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13908                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13909 000011D0 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13910                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13911                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13912                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13913 000011D5 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13914                                  
 13915                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13916 000011D7 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13917 000011DA 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13918                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13919                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13920 000011DD 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13921 000011DF C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13922 000011E3 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13923                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13924 000011E7 46                      		inc	si
 13925                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13926                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13927 000011E8 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13928                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13929 000011EB B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13930                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13931                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13932 000011EE F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13933                                  	
 13934                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13935                                  		; cf = 0
 13936                                  		;clc
 13937                                  
 13938 000011F0 C3                      		retn
 13939                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13940                                  
 13941                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13942                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13943 000011F1 F9                      		stc	
 13944                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13945 000011F2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13946                                  		;stc
 13947                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13948                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13949 000011F4 C3                      		retn
 13950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13951                                  
 13952                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13953                                  
 13954                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13955                                  ;  set media id
 13956                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13957                                  
 13958                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13959                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13960                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13961                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13962                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13963                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13964                                  ;
 13965                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13966                                  ;
 13967                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13968                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13969                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13970                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13971                                  ;
 13972                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13973                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13974                                  ;
 13975                                  ; logic:
 13976                                  ;
 13977                                  ; {
 13978                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13979                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13980                                  ;	BootIo;
 13981                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13982                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13983                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13984                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13985                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13986                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13987                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13988                                  ;		};
 13989                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13990                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13991                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13992                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13993                                  ;		};
 13994                                  ;	else
 13995                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13996                                  ;
 13997                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13998                                  
 13999                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14000                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14001                                  SetMediaId:
 14002 000011F5 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 14003 000011F8 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14004                                  					; Logical drive	number
 14005 000011FC 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 14006 000011FE C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 14007 00001203 52                      		push	dx
 14008 00001204 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14009 00001207 5A                      		pop	dx
 14010 00001208 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 14011                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 14012 0000120A 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 14013                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 14014 0000120F 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 14015                                  		
 14016 00001211 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 14017                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14018                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 14019                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14020 00001216 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 14021                                  
 14022 00001218 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 14023 00001219 57                      		push	di
 14024 0000121A 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 14025 0000121B 07                      		pop	es
 14026 0000121C BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 14027 0000121F C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 14028 00001223 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14029 00001226 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 14030                                  
 14031                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14032                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14033                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 14034                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 14035                                  		;rep movsb
 14036 00001229 E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 14037                                  
 14038 0000122C 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 14039 0000122D 1F                      		pop	ds
 14040 0000122E 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 14041 0000122F 07                      		pop	es
 14042 00001230 E892F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 14043 00001233 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 14044 00001235 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 14045 0000123A E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 14046 0000123D C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14047                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 14048                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 14049 00001242 C3                      		retn
 14050                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14051                                  
 14052                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14053                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 14054                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 14055                                  ;		stc
 14056                                  ;IOCtl_If6:
 14057                                  ;		retn
