 14059                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14060                                  
 14061                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14062                                  
 14063                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14064                                  ;	BootIo
 14065                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14066                                  ;
 14067                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 14068                                  ;
 14069                                  ; input :
 14070                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 14071                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 14072                                  ;
 14073                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 14074                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 14075                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 14076                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 14077                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 14078                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 14079                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 14080                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 14081                                  ;
 14082                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 14083                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 14084                                  ;
 14085                                  ; logic:
 14086                                  ;
 14087                                  ; {
 14088                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 14089                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 14090                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 14091                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 14092                                  ; }
 14093                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14094                                  
 14095                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14096                                  BootIo:	
 14097 00001243 06                      		push	es
 14098 00001244 57                      		push	di
 14099 00001245 53                      		push	bx
 14100 00001246 1E                      		push	ds
 14101 00001247 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 14102                                  
 14103                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 14104                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 14105                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14106                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 14107                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 14108                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 14109                                  
 14110 00001248 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 14111 0000124B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 14112 0000124D 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 14113 00001251 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 14114 00001254 E8FCF6                  		call	diskio
 14115 00001257 5B                      		pop	bx
 14116 00001258 5F                      		pop	di
 14117 00001259 07                      		pop	es
 14118 0000125A C3                      		retn
 14119                                  
 14120                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14121                                  
 14122                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14123                                  
 14124                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14125                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 14126                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14127                                  ;
 14128                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 14129                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 14130                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 14131                                  ; history in the flags.
 14132                                  ;
 14133                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 14134                                  ;
 14135                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 14136                                  ;
 14137                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 14138                                  ;
 14139                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 14140                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 14141                                  ;
 14142                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14143                                  
 14144                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 14145 0000125B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14146 0000125F 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 14147 00001261 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 14148                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14149 00001263 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 14150                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14151                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 14152 00001268 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14153 0000126A 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 14154 0000126F 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14155 00001271 E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 14156 00001274 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 14157                                  
 14158                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 14159                                  
 14160 00001276 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14161 00001278 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14162                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14163                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14164 0000127A 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14165 0000127C 53                      		push	bx
 14166 0000127D BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 14167                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 14168                                  					; physical drive
 14169 00001280 E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 14170 00001283 5B                      		pop	bx
 14171                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 14172 00001284 C3                      		retn
 14173

 14178                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14179                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 14180                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14181                                  ;
 14182                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 14183                                  ;
 14184                                  ; INPUT :
 14185                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 14186                                  ;

 14188                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 14189                                  ; ==========================================================================

 14191                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14192                                  GetAccessFlag:
 14193 00001285 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 14194 00001289 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14195                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 14196                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14197 0000128C 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 14198                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14199 0000128E 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 14200                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14201                                  					; unformatted_media
 14202 00001293 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 14203                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 14204                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14205 00001295 40                      		inc	ax
 14206                                  GafDone:
 14207 00001296 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14208 00001299 C3                      		retn
 14209                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14210                                  
 14211                                  ; 16/10/2022

 14217                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table

 14233 000012A6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14234 000012AA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done

 14245                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14246                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 14247                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14248                                  ;
 14249                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 14250                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 14251                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 14252                                  ;
 14253                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14254                                  
 14255                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14256                                  ioctl_support_query:
 14257 000012B2 06                      		push	es
 14258 000012B3 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 14259 000012B7 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 14260                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 14261                                  
 14262                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14263                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 14264                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 14265                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 14266                                  
 14267 000012BB 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 14268                                  					; See if major code is 8
 14269 000012BD 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 14270                                  ioctl_support:
 14271 000012BF 0E                      		push	cs
 14272 000012C0 07                      		pop	es
 14273                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14274                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14275 000012C1 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14276                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14277 000012C4 BF[B70C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 14278                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 14279                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 14280 000012C7 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 14281 000012C9 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 14282 000012CB 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 14283 000012CD B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 14284                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14285                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 14286                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 14287                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 14288                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 14289                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14290                                  ioctlsupexit:
 14291 000012D0 07                      		pop	es
 14292                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14293                                  		; cf = 0
 14294                                  		;clc
 14295 000012D1 C3                      		retn
 14296                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14297                                  nosupport:
 14298 000012D2 07                      		pop	es
 14299 000012D3 E9FFED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 14304                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14305                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 14306                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14307                                  ;
 14308                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 14309                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 14310                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 14311                                  ;	    drive)
 14312                                  ;
 14313                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 14314                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 14315                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 14316                                  ;
 14317                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 14318                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 14319                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 14320                                  ;
 14321                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 14322                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 14323                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14324                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14325                                  ;
 14326                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 14327                                  ;
 14328                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 14329                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 14330                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 14331                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 14332                                  ; 
 14333                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14334                                  
 14335                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14336                                  SenseMediaType:				
 14337 000012D6 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 14338 000012DA C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14339                                  		; 10/10/2022
 14340                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 14341 000012DD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14342 000012DF 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 14343                                  		;
 14344 000012E1 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14345                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 14346                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14347                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 14348 000012E5 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 14349                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 14350 000012E7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 14351 000012E9 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 14352 000012EB FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 14353                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 14354 000012ED FEC8                    		dec	al
 14355 000012EF 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 14356 000012F1 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14357 000012F3 0404                    		add	al, 4
 14358 000012F5 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 14359 000012F7 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14360 000012F9 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 14361 000012FB 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 14362                                  GotMediaType:				
 14363 000012FD 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 14364                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14365                                  		; cf = 0
 14366                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 14367 00001300 C3                      		retn
 14368                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14369                                  
 14370                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 14371 00001301 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 14372 00001304 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 14373 00001306 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 14374 00001308 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 14375 0000130B 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 14376                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 14377 0000130D B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 14378                                  SenseErrExit:				
 14379 0000130F B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 14380 00001311 F9                      		stc
 14381 00001312 C3                      		retn
 14382                                  
 14383                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14384                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14385                                  		;db    0
 14386                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14387                                  
 14388                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14389                                  
 14390                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14391                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 14392                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14393                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14394                                  
 14395                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 14396                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 14397                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 14398                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 14399                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 14400                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 14401                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 14402                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 14403                                  ;
 14404                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 14405                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 14406                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 14407                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 14408                                  ;
 14409                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 14410                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 14411                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 14412                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 14413                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 14414                                  ;
 14415                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 14416                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 14417                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 14418                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 14419                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 14420                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 14421                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 14422                                  
 14423                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 14424                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 14425                                  
 14426                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14427                                  
 14428                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 14429 00001313 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 14430 00001316 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 14431 00001318 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 14432 0000131B 7431                    		jz	short mine
 14433                                  
 14434                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 14435                                  
 14436 0000131D 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 14437 00001320 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 14438 00001322 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 14439 00001325 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14440 00001327 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14442                                  
 14443                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14444 0000132A CF                      		iret
 14445                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14446

 14452                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 14453 0000132E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 14454                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14455                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 14456                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 14457                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 14458                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 14459                                  		
 14460                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14461                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 14462 00001333 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 14463                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 14464 00001337 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 14465                                  
 14466                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 14467                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 14468                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 14469                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 14470                                  		
 14471                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 14472                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14473 0000133B 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 14474 0000133F A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 14475                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 14476                                  		; 02/09/2023

 14478 00001346 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 14479

 14481                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14482                                  		;pop	bx
 14483 0000134B 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 14484                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 14485 0000134C 58                      		pop	ax
 14486                                  i2f_iret:
 14487 0000134D CF                      		iret

 14490                                  mine:

 14528                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 14529                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 14530                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf

 14563                                  ; 17/10/2022

 14565                                  
 14566                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 14567                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 14568                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 14569                                  
 14570                                  win386call:				
 14571 0000138E 1E                      		push	ds
 14572 0000138F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14573                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14574                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 14575 00001394 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 14576                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 14577 00001396 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 14578 00001398 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 14579                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 14580 0000139A 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 14581                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14582 0000139C F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 14583                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 14584 0000139F 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14585                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 14586 000013A1 8026[6608]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 14587 000013A6 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret

 14594 000013AB 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14595                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 14596 000013AD 800E[6608]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 14597                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 14598                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 14599 000013B2 891E[3408]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 14600 000013B6 8C06[3608]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 14601                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 14602 000013BA BB[3208]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 14603 000013BD 1E                      		push	ds
 14604 000013BE 07                      		pop	es
 14605                                  win_iret:
 14606 000013BF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14607                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 14608                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 14609                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14610 000013C0 CF                      		iret
 14611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 14613                                  handle_multmult:
 14614 000013C1 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 14615 000013C3 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 14616 000013C5 1E                      		push	ds
 14617 000013C6 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 14618                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14619                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 14620                                  		;dec	bx
 14621 000013C9 BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 14622 000013CC 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 14623 000013CE 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 14624 000013D0 F7D3                    		not	bx
 14625 000013D2 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 14626 000013D4 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 14627 000013D6 43                      		inc	bx
 14628                                  try_1:

 14630                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 14631                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14632 000013D8 CF                      		iret
 14633                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14634                                  
 14635                                  try_2:
 14636 000013D9 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 14637 000013DB 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 14638 000013DD 1E                      		push	ds
 14639                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14640                                  		;xor	di, di
 14641                                  		;dec	di
 14642 000013DE BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 14643 000013E1 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
