 15758                                  chkopcnt:		
 15759 00001803 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15760 00001808 C3                      		retn
 15761                                  
 15762                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15763                                  
 15764                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15765                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15766                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15767                                  ;
 15768                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15769                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15770                                  
 15771                                  mediacheck:	
 15772 00001809 E8BDF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15773 0000180C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15774 0000180E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15775 00001811 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15776 00001813 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15777 00001816 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15778 00001818 50                      		push	ax
 15779 00001819 52                      		push	dx
 15780 0000181A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15781                                  					; set logical drive number
 15782 0000181E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15783 00001820 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15784                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15785                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15786 00001822 5A                      		pop	dx
 15787 00001823 58                      		pop	ax
 15788 00001824 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15789 00001826 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15790                                  
 15791                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15792                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15793                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15794                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15795                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15796                                  ; status.
 15797                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15798 00001829 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15799 0000182D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15800                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15801                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15802                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15803                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15804 00001831 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15805                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15806                                  
 15807                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15808                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15809                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15810                                  
 15811 00001833 50                      		push	ax
 15812 00001834 51                      		push	cx
 15813 00001835 52                      		push	dx
 15814 00001836 E8B7ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15815 00001839 5A                      		pop	dx
 15816 0000183A 59                      		pop	cx
 15817 0000183B 58                      		pop	ax
 15818 0000183C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15819 0000183E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15820                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15821 00001840 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15822                                  mediaret:				
 15823 00001842 C3                      		retn
 15824                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15825                                  
 15826                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15827                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15828                                  ; or write.
 15829                                  
 15830                                  mediadovolid:				
 15831 00001843 E84AEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15832 00001846 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15833 00001848 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15834 0000184B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15835 0000184D E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15836                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15837                                  
 15838                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15839                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15840                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15841                                  ; dos.
 15842                                  ;
 15843                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15844                                  
 15845                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15846                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15847                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15848                                  
 15849                                  checklatchio:	
 15850                                  
 15851                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15852                                  			
 15853 00001850 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15854 00001853 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15855                                  
 15856                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15857                                  
 15858 00001855 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15859 00001858 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15860                                  
 15861                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15862                                  ; expensive verification.
 15863                                  
 15864 0000185A E833EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15865 0000185D 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15866 0000185F E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15867 00001862 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15868 00001864 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15869 00001866 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15870 00001868 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15871                                  checklatchret:				
 15872 0000186B E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15873                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15874 0000186E F9                      		stc
 15875 0000186F 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15876                                  checkret:				
 15877 00001870 C3                      		retn
 15878                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15879                                  
 15880                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15881                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15882                                  ;
 15883                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15884                                  
 15885                                  checkfatvid:				
 15886 00001871 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15887 00001874 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15888 00001876 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15889                                  
 15890                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15891                                  
 15892                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15893                                  
 15894                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15895                                  
 15896                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15897                                  ;
 15898                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15899                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15900                                  ;
 15901                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15902                                  ;
 15903                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15904                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15905                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15906                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15907                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15908                                  ;
 15909                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15910                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15911                                  ; routine.)
 15912                                  ;
 15913                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15914                                  
 15915                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15916                                  check_vid:
 15917                                  
 15918                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15919                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15920                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15921                                  
 15922 00001878 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15923                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15924                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15925 0000187D 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15926 0000187F E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15927 00001882 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15928 00001884 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15929 00001886 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15930                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15931 0000188B 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15932                                  					; if not fat system
 15933 0000188D E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15934 00001890 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15935 00001892 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15936 00001895 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15937                                  					; definitely changed
 15938 00001898 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15939                                  
 15940 0000189A 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15941                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15942 0000189B E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15943                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15944                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15945                                  		;clc
 15946                                  checkfatret:				
 15947 0000189E C3                      		retn
 15948                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15949                                  
 15950                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15951                                  changed_drv:
 15952 0000189F F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15953 000018A0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15954                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15955 000018A5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15956                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15957                                  
 15958                                  ; extended id check
 15959                                  
 15960                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15961                                  
 15962                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15963                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15964                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15965                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15966                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15967                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15968                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15969                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15970                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15971                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15972                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15973                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15974                                  ;
 15975                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15976                                  
 15977                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15978                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15979 000018A6 50                      		push	ax
 15980                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15981                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15982 000018A7 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15983                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15984 000018AA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15985 000018AC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15986 000018B0 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15987 000018B2 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15988 000018B5 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15989 000018B9 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15990                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15991                                  					; don't know
 15992 000018BB 58                      		pop	ax
 15993 000018BC EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15994                                  					; reset the flag
 15995                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15996                                  
 15997                                  ext_changed:
 15998 000018BE 58                      		pop	ax
 15999                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16000 000018BF 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 16001                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 16002                                  					; disk changed!
 16003                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16004                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 16005                                  		;clc
 16006 000018C0 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 16007                                  
 16008                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16009                                  
 16010                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 16011                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 16012                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 16013                                  ;
 16014                                  ; es:di -> bds
 16015                                  
 16016                                  checkio:				
 16017 000018C2 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 16018 000018C5 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 16019 000018C7 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 16020 000018CA 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 16021 000018CC E8C1ED                  		call	GetBp
 16022 000018CF 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 16023 000018D1 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 16024 000018D4 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 16025 000018D6 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 16026 000018D8 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 16027 000018DA 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 16028 000018DB C3                      		retn
 16029                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16030                                  
 16031                                  checkioerr:				
 16032 000018DC E80700                  		call	returnvid
 16033                                  
 16034                                  checkioret:				
 16035 000018DF F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 16036 000018E0 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 16037                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16038                                  
 16039                                  no_error_map:				
 16040 000018E3 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 16041                                  
 16042                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16043                                  
 16044                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 16045                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 16046                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 16047                                  
 16048                                  returnvid:		
 16049 000018E6 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 16050                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 16051 000018E9 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 16052 000018EC B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 16053 000018EE F9                      		stc
 16054 000018EF C3                      		retn
 16055                                  
 16056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16057                                  
 16058                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 16059                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 16060                                  ;
 16061                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 16062                                  ; **trashes si**
 16063                                  
 16064                                  media_set_vid:				
 16065 000018F0 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 16066                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 16067                                  
 16068                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 16069                                  
 16070                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16071                                  
 16072                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 16073                                  
 16074                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16075                                  vid_into_packet:
 16076 000018F3 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 16077 000018F4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16078 000018F8 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16079 000018FB 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 16080 000018FD 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16081 00001900 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 16082 00001903 1F                      		pop	ds
 16083                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 16084 00001904 C3                      		retn
 16085                                  
 16086                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16087                                  
 16088                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16089                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 16090                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 16091                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 16092                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 16093                                  ;
 16094                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 16095                                  ;		ah has media byte
 16096                                  ;
 16097                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 16098                                  ;		    no registers modified
 16099                                  ;		carry set
 16100                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 16101                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 16102                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 16103                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 16104                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 16105                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 16106                                  ;
 16107                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16108                                  
 16109                                  hidensity:
 16110                                  
 16111                                  ; check for correct drive
 16112                                  		
 16113                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16114 00001905 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16115                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 16116                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 16117 0000190A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 16118                                  
 16119                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 16120                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 16121                                  
 16122 0000190C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 16123 00001911 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 16124                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 16125                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 16126 00001913 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 16127 00001916 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 16128                                  
 16129                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 16130                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 16131                                  
 16132                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16133 00001918 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16134 0000191C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 16135                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16136                                  					; ffOther
 16137 0000191E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 16138 00001920 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 16139                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16140                                  					; ff288
 16141 00001922 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 16142 00001924 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 16143 00001926 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 16144                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 16145                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 16146 00001929 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 16147                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 16148                                  					; 2 sides
 16149                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16150 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 16151 0000192D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 16152                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 16153                                  					; & head max
 16154                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16155 00001930 E9C6ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 16156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16157                                  
 16158                                  Is720K:
 16159                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16160 00001933 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 16161                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16162 00001934 E98FED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 16163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16164                                  
 16165                                  		; 18/12/2022
 16166                                  ;dofloppy:
 16167                                  		;retn
 16168                                  
 16169                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16170                                  
 16171                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16172                                  
 16173                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16174                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 16175                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 16176                                  ;
 16177                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 16178                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 16179                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16180                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 16181                                  ;
 16182                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 16183                                  ;
 16184                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 16185                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16186                                  
 16187                                  set_changed_dl:	
 16188 00001937 06                      		push	es
 16189 00001938 57                      		push	di
 16190                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 16191                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16192 00001939 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 16193                                  
 16194                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 16195                                  
 16196                                  scan_bds:				
 16197 0000193D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16198 00001941 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 16199                                  
 16200                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 16201                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 16202                                  
 16203 00001943 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16204                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 16205                                  get_next_bds:				
 16206 00001947 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16207                                  					; go to	next bds
 16208 0000194A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 16209 0000194D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 16210 0000194F 5F                      		pop	di
 16211 00001950 07                      		pop	es
 16212 00001951 C3                      		retn
 16213                                  
 16214                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16215                                  
 16216                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16217                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 16218                                  ;
 16219                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 16220                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 16221                                  ;		zero reset - change
 16222                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16223                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16224                                  
 16225                                  checkromchange:	
 16226                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 16227                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16228 00001952 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 16229                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16230                                  					; fchanged
 16231 00001957 C3                      		retn
 16232                                  
 16233                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16234                                  
 16235                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16236                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 16237                                  ;
 16238                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16239                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16240                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16241                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16242                                  
 16243                                  resetchanged:	
 16244                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 16245                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16246 00001958 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 16247                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16248                                  					; ~fchanged
 16249 0000195D C3                      		retn
 16250                                  
 16251                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16252                                  
 16253                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16254                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 16255                                  ;
 16256                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16257                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 16258                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 16259                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16260                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16261                                  
 16262                                  haschange:
 16263                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 16264                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16265 0000195E 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16266                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16267                                  					; fchangeline
 16268 00001963 C3                      		retn
 16269                                  
 16270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16271                                  
 16272                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16273                                  
 16274                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16275                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 16276                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16277                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 16278                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 16279                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16280                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16281                                  
 16282                                  ; set_volume_id
 16283                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 16284                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 16285                                  ;
 16286                                  ;   on entry:
 16287                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 16288                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 16289                                  ;
 16290                                  ;   on exit:
 16291                                  ;	carry clear:
 16292                                  ;	   successful call
 16293                                  ;	carry set
 16294                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 16295                                  
 16296                                  set_volume_id:				
 16297 00001964 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 16298 00001965 50                      		push	ax
 16299 00001966 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 16300 00001969 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 16301 0000196B E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 16302 0000196E 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 16303 00001970 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 16304 00001973 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 16305                                  setvret:				
 16306                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16307                                  		; cf = 0
 16308                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 16309 00001976 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 16310 00001977 5A                      		pop	dx
 16311 00001978 C3                      		retn
 16312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16313                                  
 16314                                  seterr:					
 16315 00001979 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 16316 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 16317 0000197B C3                      		retn
 16318                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16319 0000197C 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 16320                                  
 16321                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16322                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 16323                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16324                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 16325                                  
 16326                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16327                                  
 16328                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16329                                  
 16330                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16331                                  ;
 16332                                  ;   on entry:
 16333                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 16334                                  ;
 16335                                  ;   on exit:
 16336                                  ;	carry clear
 16337                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 16338                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 16339                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 16340                                  ;
 16341                                  ;	carry set:
 16342                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 16343                                  
 16344                                  read_volume_id:
 16345 0000197E 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 16346 0000197F 51                      		push	cx
 16347 00001980 53                      		push	bx
 16348 00001981 50                      		push	ax
 16349 00001982 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 16350 00001983 57                      		push	di
 16351 00001984 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 16352 00001985 07                      		pop	es
 16353 00001986 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16354 00001989 BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16355                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 16356 0000198C B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 16357 0000198F F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16358 00001991 5F                      		pop	di
 16359 00001992 07                      		pop	es
 16360 00001993 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 16361                                  					; # of fats
 16362 00001997 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 16363                                  					; sectors / fat
 16364 0000199B F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 16365 0000199D 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 16366                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 16367                                  					;
 16368                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 16369                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16370 000019A1 2EA3[7C19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 16371                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 16372                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 16373 000019A5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 16374                                  					; # root dir entries
 16375 000019A9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 16376 000019AB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 16377                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16378                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 16379 000019AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16380                                  next_sec:
 16381 000019AE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 16382 000019AF 2EA1[7C19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16383                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 16384                                  					; get sector #
 16385 000019B3 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16386                                  					; sectors / track
 16387 000019B7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16388 000019B9 F7F1                    		div	cx
 16389                                  
 16390                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 16391                                  
 16392 000019BB 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 16393                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 16394 000019BC 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 16395 000019BE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16396 000019C0 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 16397                                  					; # heads on this disc
 16398 000019C4 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 16399 000019C6 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 16400 000019C8 E83CEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 16401                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 16402 000019CB 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 16403 000019CD B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 16404 000019D0 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 16405                                  fvid_loop:
 16406                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16407 000019D2 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 16408                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 16409 000019D4 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 16410 000019D6 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 16411 000019D9 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 16412 000019DB 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 16413 000019DE 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 16414                                  ent_loop:
 16415 000019E0 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 16416 000019E3 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 16417 000019E5 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 16418 000019E6 2EFF06[7C19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16419                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 16420                                  					; next sector
 16421 000019EB E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 16422                                  notfound:
 16423                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16424                                  		;xor	si, si
 16425 000019ED EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16427                                  
 16428                                  found_vid:
 16429                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16430                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 16431 000019EF 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16432 000019F0 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16433 000019F2 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16434 000019F3 57                      		push	di
 16435 000019F4 1E                      		push	ds
 16436 000019F5 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16437 000019F6 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16438 000019F9 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16439                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16440 000019FC F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16441                                  		;xor	al, al
 16442                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16443 000019FE 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16444 000019FF AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16445                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16446                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16447                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16448 00001A00 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16449 00001A01 07                      		pop	es
 16450                                  fvid_ret:
 16451                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16452 00001A02 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16453                                  				
 16454 00001A04 58                      		pop	ax
 16455                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16456                                  		; cf = 0
 16457                                  		;clc
 16458                                  rvidret:
 16459 00001A05 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16460 00001A06 59                      		pop	cx
 16461 00001A07 5A                      		pop	dx
 16462 00001A08 C3                      		retn
 16463                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16464                                  
 16465                                  no_vid:
 16466 00001A09 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16467                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16468                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16469 00001A0A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16471                                  
 16472                                  readviderr:
 16473 00001A0C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16474 00001A0D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16475 00001A0E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16476                                  
 16477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16478                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16479                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16480                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16481 00001A10 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16482                                  		;
 16483                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16484                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16485                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16486                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16487 00001A13 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16488 00001A16 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16489                                  		;
 16490 00001A19 FC                      		cld
 16491 00001A1A C3                      		retn
 16492                                  
 16493                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16494                                  
 16495                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16496                                  ;
 16497                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16498                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16499                                  
 16500                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16501 00001A1B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16502                                  		;push	si
 16503 00001A1C 51                      		push	cx
 16504                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16505 00001A1D 56                      		push	si
 16506                                  
 16507                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16508                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16509                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16510                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16511                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16512                                  		;cld
 16513                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16514 00001A1E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16515                                  
 16516 00001A21 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16517                                  		
 16518                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16519 00001A23 5E                      		pop	si
 16520                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16521 00001A24 59                      		pop	cx
 16522                                  		;pop	si
 16523 00001A25 5F                      		pop	di
 16524 00001A26 C3                      		retn
 16525                                  
 16526                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16527                                  
 16528                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16529                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16530                                  ;
 16531                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16532                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16533                                  
 16534                                  check_volume_id:
 16535 00001A27 57                      		push	di
 16536 00001A28 51                      		push	cx
 16537                                  		
 16538                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16539                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16540                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16541                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16542                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16543                                  		;cld
 16544                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16545 00001A29 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16546                                  
 16547 00001A2C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16548                                  		
 16549                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16550                                  		;pop	cx
 16551                                  		;pop	di
 16552                                  		;retn
 16553 00001A2E EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 16554                                  
 16555                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16556                                  
 16557                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16558                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16559                                  ;
 16560                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16561                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16562                                  ;
 16563                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16564                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16565                                  ;
 16566                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16567                                  
 16568                                  fat_check:
 16569 00001A30 50                      		push	ax
 16570 00001A31 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16571 00001A33 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16572 00001A36 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16573                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16574 00001A3A 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16575 00001A3C 4E                      		dec	si
 16576                                  okret1:
 16577 00001A3D 58                      		pop	ax
 16578 00001A3E C3                      		retn

 16609                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16610                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16611                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16612                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16613                                  
 16614                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 16615                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 16616                                  
 16617                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 16618

 16620                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 16621                                  ; ============================================================================
 16622                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 16636                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16637                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 16638                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16639                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 30/12/2022))
 16640                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16641                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 16642                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16643                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 16644                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16645                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit6.s -l sysinit6.lst -o SYSINIT6.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 16646                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16647                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 16648                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16649                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 16650                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 16651                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16652                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 16653                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 16654                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16655                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 16656                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 16657                                  
 16658                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 
 16659                                  ; Retro DOS v4.0 - 2019
 16660                                  ; SYSINIT (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) draft: 'sysinit3.s' (01/07/2019)
 16661                                   
 16662                                  ; 21/10/2022
 16663                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16664                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 16665                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 16666                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 16667                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16668                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 16669                                  
 16670                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16671                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 16672                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16673                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 16674                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 16675                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 16676                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 16677                                  ;
 16678                                  ;
 16679                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 16680                                  ;
 16681                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 16682                                  ;
 16683                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 16684                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16685                                  ;
 16686                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 16687                                  ;
 16688                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 16689                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16690                                  ;
 16691                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 16692                                  ;
 16693                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 16694                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 16695                                  ;value.
 16696                                  ;
 16697                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 16698                                  ;
 16699                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 16700                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 16701                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 16702                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 16703                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 16704                                  ;
 16705                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 16706                                  ;
 16707                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 16708                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 16709                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 16710                                  ;
 16711                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 16712                                  ;
 16713                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 16714                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16715                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 16716                                  ;
 16717                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 16718                                  ;
 16719                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 16720                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16721                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 16722                                  ;
 16723                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 16724                                  ;
 16725                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 16726                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 16727                                  ;
 16728                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 16729                                  ;
 16730                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 16731                                  ;
 16732                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 16733                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 16734                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 16735                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 16736                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 16737                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 16738                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 16739                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 16740                                  ;memory.
 16741                                  ;NOTES:
 16742                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 16743                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 16744                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 16745                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 16746                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 16747                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 16748                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 16749                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 16750                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 16751                                  
 16752                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16753                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 16754                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16755                                  
 16756                                  ;include version.inc
 16757                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16758                                  
 16759                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 16760                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 16761                                  
 16762                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 16763                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 16764                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 16765                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 16766                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 16767                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 16768                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 16769                                  
 16770                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 16771                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16772                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 16773                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 16774                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16775                                  
 16776                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 16777                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16778                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 16779                                  ;MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 16780                                  
 16781                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21)
 16782                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	6
 16783                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	22
 16784                                  
 16785                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 16786                                  
 16787                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 16788                                  				; currently 0.
 16789                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 16790                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 16791                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 16792                                  
 16793                                  ;      if1
 16794                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 16795                                  ;      endif
 16796                                  
 16797                                         ;******************************
 16798                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 16799                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 16800                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 16801                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 16802                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 16803                                         ;******************************
 16804                                  
 16805                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16806                                  ; device definitions
 16807                                  
 16808                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 16809                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 16810                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 16811                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 16812                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 16813                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 16814                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 16815                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 16816                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 16817

 16819                                  struc	SYSDEV
 16820 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 16821 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 16822 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 16823 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 16824 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 16825                                  .size:

 16829                                  struc	SRHEAD
 16830 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 16831 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 16832 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 16833 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 16834 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 16835                                  .size:
 16836                                  endstruc
 16837                                  
 16838                                  ;Status word masks
 16839                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 16840                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 16841                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 16842                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 16843                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 16844                                  
 16845                                  ;Function codes
 16846                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 16847                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 16848                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 16849                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 16850                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 16851                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 16852                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 16853                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 16854                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 16855                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 16856                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 16857                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 16858                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 16859                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 16860                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 16861                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 16862                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 16863                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 16864                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 16865                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
 16866                                  
 16867                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16868                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 16869 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 16870 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 16871 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 16872 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 16873 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 16874 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 16875                                                          ; word
 16876 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 16877 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 16878 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 16879 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 16880                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 16881                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 16882                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 16883                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 16884                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 16885                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 16886                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 16887                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 16888 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 16889 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 16890 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 16891 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 16892 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 16893 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 16894                                  .size:
 16895                                  endstruc
