 31919 00002B30 7402                    	je	short iwX
 31920 00002B32 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9	; Tab
 31921                                  iwX:	
 31922 00002B34 C3                      	retn

 31975                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31976                                  ;*** stowUMB - marks a given UMB as used, if it hasn't been so marked before
 31977                                  ;            -- accepts a UMB # in AL, and makes sure it hasn't yet been
 31978                                  ; listed in the /L:... chain. If it's the first one specified, it sets UmbLoad
 31979                                  ; to that UMB #... and in any case, it marks the UMB as specified.
 31980                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31981                                  ; ENTRY:    AL contains UMB number, as specified by the user
 31982                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31983                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if UMB # is less than 0 or >= MAXUMB (see highvar.inc)
 31984                                  ; USES:     AX, Flags, variables in highvar.inc
 31985                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31986                                  
 31987                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31988                                  stowUMB:

 31990 00002B4A 7202                    	jb	short su10
 31991 00002B4C F9                      	stc
 31992 00002B4D C3                      	retn			; Ooops-- UMB>=MAXUMB
 31993                                  su10:

 31995                                  	;push	bx

 31997                                  	;push	si
 31998                                  	;push	ds
 31999                                  	;push	es
 32000                                  	;push	cs
 32001                                  	;pop	es
 32002                                  	;push	cs
 32003                                  	;pop	ds
 32004                                  
 32005                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32006                                  	; ds <> cs
 32007                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:UmbLoad],0FFh
 32008 00002B4E 2E803E[191F]FF          	cmp	byte [cs:UmbLoad],UNSPECIFIED
 32009                                  				; If this, we haven't been here before
 32010 00002B54 7504                    	jne	short su20
 32011 00002B56 2EA2[191F]              	mov	[cs:UmbLoad],al	; So remember this UMB as the load UMB slot.
 32012                                  
 32013                                  	;;cmp	byte [UmbLoad],0FFh
 32014                                  	;cmp	byte [UmbLoad],UNSPECIFIED ; If this, we haven't been here before
 32015                                  	;jne	short su20
 32016                                  	;mov	[UmbLoad],al	; So remember this UMB as the load UMB slot.
 32017                                  su20:

 32019 00002B5C 740E                    	jz	short su30	; that we should do here.

 32088                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32089                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 32090                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 32091                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 32092                                  ; A-F are considered valid iff gnradix is 16.
 32093                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32094                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 32095                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 32096                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 32097                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 32098                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32099                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 32100                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 32101                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 32102                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32103                                  
 32104                                  gnradix:
 32105 00002B6D 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 32106                                  
 32107                                  toDigit:
 32108 00002B6F 2E833E[6D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 32109 00002B75 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 32110                                  
 32111                                  toDigit_hex:
 32112 00002B77 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 32113 00002B7A 7209                    	jb	short td10
 32114 00002B7C 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 32115 00002B7F 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'z' at all...
 32116 00002B81 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 32117                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 32118 00002B84 C3                      	retn
 32119                                  td10:	
 32120 00002B85 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 32121 00002B88 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'?  Not a letter...
 32122 00002B8A 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 32123 00002B8D 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'?  Not a digit.
 32124 00002B8F 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 32125                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 32126 00002B92 C3                      	retn
 32127                                  toDigit_dec:
 32128                                  td20:	
 32129 00002B93 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 32130                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 32131 00002B96 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 32132 00002B98 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 32133 00002B9B 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 32134 00002B9D 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 32135                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 32136 00002BA0 C3                      	retn
 32137                                  tdE:	
 32138 00002BA1 F9                      	stc
 32139                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 32140 00002BA2 C3                      	retn
 32141                                  
 32142                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32143                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 32144                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32145                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 32146                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 32147                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 32148                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 32149                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32150                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 32151                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 32152                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 32153                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32154                                  
 32155                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32156                                  
 32157                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32158                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 32159                                  
 32160                                  GetXNum:
 32161                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 32162                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32163                                  	;push	bx
 32164 00002BA3 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32165                                  	;push	ds
 32166                                  
 32167 00002BA4 FC                      	cld
 32168 00002BA5 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32169 00002BA7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32170 00002BA9 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32171 00002BAB 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 32172                                  
 32173 00002BAD 2EC706[6D2B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 32174                                  
 32175 00002BB4 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 32176                                  	;call	toDigit
 32177 00002BB7 E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 32178                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 32179                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32180 00002BBA 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 32181                                  
 32182 00002BBC 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 32183 00002BBE 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 32184 00002BC0 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 32185 00002BC4 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 32186 00002BC7 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 32187 00002BC9 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 32188 00002BCC 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 32189                                  
 32190                                  gxn10:	
 32191 00002BCE 2EC706[6D2B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 32192 00002BD5 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 32193 00002BD6 46                      	inc	si
 32194                                  
 32195                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 32196                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 32197                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 32198                                  ;        BX    = 0
 32199                                  ;        CH    = 0
 32200                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 32201                                  
 32202                                  gxn20:	
 32203 00002BD7 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 32204 00002BDA 46                      	inc	si
 32205                                  
 32206 00002BDB E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 32207 00002BDE 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 32208                                  
 32209 00002BE0 E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 32210 00002BE3 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 32211                                  
 32212 00002BE5 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 32213 00002BE7 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 iff last add wrapped
 32214                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 32215                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 32216 00002BE9 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 32217                                  gxnE:	
 32218                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 32219 00002BEB EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 32220                                  gxnQ:	
 32221 00002BED 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 32222 00002BEE F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 32223                                  gxnX:	
 32224                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32225                                  	;pop	ds
 32226 00002BEF 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32227                                  	;pop	bx
 32228 00002BF0 C3                      	retn
 32229                                  
 32230                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32231                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 32232                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32233                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 32234                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 32235                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 32236                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 32237                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32238                                  
 32239                                  mul32:
 32240 00002BF1 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32241 00002BF2 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32242 00002BF4 2EF726[6D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32243 00002BF9 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 32244                                  
 32245 00002BFB 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 32246 00002BFD 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 32247                                  
 32248 00002BFE 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 32249 00002C00 2EF726[6D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry,  AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 32250 00002C05 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 32251 00002C07 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 32252 00002C09 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 32253 00002C0B C3                      	retn
 32254                                  m32E:	
 32255 00002C0C 58                      	pop	ax
 32256 00002C0D C3                      	retn
 32257                                  
 32258                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32259                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 32260                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32261                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 32262                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 32263                                  ; ERROR:   None
 32264                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 32265                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32266                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 32267                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 32268                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32269                                  
 32270                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32271                                  toPara:
 32272 00002C0E 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 32273                                  
 32274 00002C0F B104                    	mov	cl,4		;
 32275 00002C11 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 32276 00002C13 92                      	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 32277 00002C14 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32278 00002C16 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 32279 00002C18 09D0                    	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 32280                                  
 32281 00002C1A 59                      	pop	cx
 32282 00002C1B C3                      	retn

 32284                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32285                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 32286                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32287                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 32288                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 32289                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 32290                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32291                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32292                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 32293                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 32294                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 32295                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 32296                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32297                                  
 32298                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32299                                  UmbHead:
 32300                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 32301                                  
 32302                                  	;push	si ; ?
 32303                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 32304                                  	;push	es
 32305                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 32306                                  
 32307                                  	; 09/04/2019
 32308                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 32309                                  
 32310 00002C1C B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 32311 00002C1E CD21                    	int	21h
 32312                                  
 32313 00002C20 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 32314                                  	
 32315                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32316 00002C24 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 32317 00002C27 F5                      	cmc
 32318                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 32319 00002C28 C3                      	retn

 32344                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)

 32360                                  ism10:

 32362                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h

 32370                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32371                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 32372                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32373                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 32374                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 32375                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 32376                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32378                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 32379                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 32380                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 32381                                  ;      ...
 32382                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 32383                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32384                                  
 32385                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32386                                  AddrToUmb:
 32387                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32388                                  	;push	cx
 32389                                  	;push	dx
 32390 00002C39 06                      	push	es
 32391                                  
 32392 00002C3A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 32393                                  
 32394 00002C3C E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 32395 00002C3F 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 32396                                  
 32397                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32398                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 32399 00002C41 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 32400                                  
 32401                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32402                                  atu10:
 32403 00002C43 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 32404                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 32405                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 32406                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 32407                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 32408                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 32409                                  
 32410                                  ;atu10:	
 32411                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 32412 00002C45 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 32413 00002C47 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 32414                                  
 32415 00002C49 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 32416 00002C4C 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 32417                                  
 32418 00002C4E 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 32419                                  atu20:	
 32420                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32421                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32422                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32423                                  	; ax = es
 32424                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32425 00002C4F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32426 00002C54 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32427 00002C5A 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32428                                  
 32429                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 32430                                  
 32431                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32432                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 32433                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32434 00002C5C 40                      	inc	ax
 32435                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32436                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32437 00002C5D EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 32438                                  
 32439                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32440                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 32441                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 32442                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32443                                  
 32444                                  atu30:	
 32445                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32446                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 32447                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32448                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 32449 00002C5F 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 32450 00002C61 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 32451                                  atuE:	
 32452 00002C63 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 32453 00002C65 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 32454                                  atuX:	
 32455 00002C66 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 32456                                  	
 32457 00002C68 07                      	pop	es	
 32458                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32459                                  	;pop	dx
 32460                                  	;pop	cx
 32461 00002C69 C3                      	retn
 32462                                  
 32463                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32464                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 32465                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 32466                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 32467                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 32468                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32469                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 32470                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 32471                                  ; ERROR:  None
 32472                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32473                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32474                                  
 32475                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32476                                  convUMB:
 32477 00002C6A 2E833E[6D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 32478 00002C70 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 32479 00002C72 E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 32480                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 32481                                  	;jne	short cu10
 32482                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 32483                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32484 00002C75 40                      	inc	ax
 32485 00002C76 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 32486 00002C78 48                      	dec	ax
 32487                                  cu10:	
 32488 00002C79 C3                      	retn

 32518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32519                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 32520                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32521                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 32522                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 32523                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 32524                                  ; ERROR:  None
 32525                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 32526                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32527                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 32528                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 32529                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 32530                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 32531                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32532

 32540                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 32541                                  	jne	short ll10
 32542                                  
 32543                                  	stc
 32544                                  ll15:
 32545                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 32546                                  	;stc
 32547                                  	;jmp	short llX
 32548                                  	retn
 32549                                  ll10:	
 32550                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 32551                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 32552                                  
 32553                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32554                                  	retn
 32555                                  
 32556                                  	;mov	al,1
 32557                                  	;clc
 32558                                  ;llX:
 32559                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 32560                                  	;retn
 32561                                  
 32562                                  %endif

 32670                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32671                                  ; ENTRY:  None

 32676                                  
 32677                                  ; 08/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 32878                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 33025                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33026                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 33027                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 33028                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33029                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33030                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 33031                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 33032                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33033                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33034                                  
 33035                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33036                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 33037                                  findUMB:
 33038                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33039                                  	;push	ax
 33040                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33041 00002D42 51                      	push	cx ; *
 33042                                  	;push	dx
 33043                                  
 33044 00002D43 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 33045                                  
 33046 00002D45 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 33047                                  
 33048 00002D47 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 33049                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33050                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 33051 00002D4A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 33052                                  
 33053                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33054                                  fu10:
 33055 00002D4C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 33056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33057                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 33058                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 33059                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 33060                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33061                                  
 33062                                  ;fu10:	
 33063 00002D4E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 33064 00002D50 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 33065                                  
 33066 00002D52 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 33067 00002D55 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 33068                                  
 33069 00002D57 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 33070                                  fu20:	
 33071                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33072                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33073                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33074 00002D58 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 33075 00002D5E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 33076                                  
 33077                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 33078                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33079                                  	; ax = es
 33080                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 33081                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33082 00002D60 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33083 00002D65 40                      	inc	ax
 33084                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33085                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 33086 00002D66 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 33087                                  fuE:	
 33088 00002D68 F9                      	stc
 33089                                  fuX:
 33090                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33091                                  	;pop	dx
 33092                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33093 00002D69 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 33094                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 33095 00002D6A C3                      	retn
 33096                                  
 33097                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33098                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 33099                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33100                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33101                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 33102                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 33103                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33104                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33105                                  
 33106                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 33107                                  BigFree:
 33108                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33109                                  	;push	bx
 33110 00002D6B 51                      	push	cx
 33111                                  
 33112 00002D6C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 33113 00002D6F 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 33114                                  
 33115 00002D71 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 33116 00002D73 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 33117                                  
 33118                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33119                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 33120                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 33121                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 33122                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33123                                  
 33124                                  bf10:	
 33125 00002D75 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 33126 00002D78 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 33127                                  
 33128                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 33129 00002D7A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 33130 00002D80 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 33131                                  
 33132 00002D82 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33133                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 33134 00002D86 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 33135                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 33136                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33137 00002D88 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 33138                                  
 33139 00002D8A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 33140                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 33141 00002D8C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 33142                                  
 33143                                  bf20:	
 33144                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33145                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 33146                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33147                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 33148 00002D8E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33149 00002D94 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 33150                                  
 33151                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 33152 00002D96 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 33153                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33154 00002D98 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33155 00002D9D 40                      	inc     ax
 33156 00002D9E 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 33157                                  
 33158 00002DA0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 33159                                  
 33160 00002DA2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 33161 00002DA4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 33162 00002DA6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33163 00002DA8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 33164                                  bfE:	
 33165 00002DAA F9                      	stc
 33166                                  bfX:
 33167 00002DAB 59                      	pop	cx
 33168                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33169                                  	;pop	bx
 33170 00002DAC C3                      	retn
 33171                                  
 33172                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33173                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 33174                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33175                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33176                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 33177                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33178                                  ; USES:     Flags

 33202

 33204                                  
 33205                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33206                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33207                                  	;pop	ax
 33208                                  
 33209 00002DB7 C3                      	retn
 33210                                  
 33211                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33212                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 33213                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33214                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 33215                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 33216                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 33217                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33218                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33219                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 33220                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 33221                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 33222                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 33223                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 33224                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33225                                  
 33226                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 33227                                  
 33228                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33229                                  
 33230                                  shrinkMCB:
 33231                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 33232                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33233                                  	;push	bx
 33234 00002DB8 51                      	push	cx
 33235 00002DB9 06                      	push	es
 33236                                  
 33237 00002DBA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 33238                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33239                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 33240                                  
 33241 00002DBC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33242                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33243 00002DC1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 33244                                  
 33245 00002DC3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33246                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33247                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 33248                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 33249                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33250                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 33251                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33252 00002DC6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 33253 00002DC8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 33254                                  
 33255 00002DCA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33256                                  	
 33257                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33258                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33259 00002DCF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33260                                  
 33261 00002DD1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 33262 00002DD6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 33263                                  
 33264 00002DDC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 33265 00002DDE 40                      	inc	ax
 33266 00002DDF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 33267                                  
 33268 00002DE1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 33269 00002DE3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 33270                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33271                                  	; ax > 0
 33272 00002DE5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 33273                                  
 33274                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33275 00002DE6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 33276                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 33277 00002DEB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 33278                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33279                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 33280                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 33281                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 33282                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 33283                                  
 33284                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33285 00002DEF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 33286                                  
 33287                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33288                                  	; cf=0
 33289                                  	;clc
 33290                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33291                                  	;jmp	short smX
 33292                                  smE:	
 33293                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33294                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 33295                                  	;stc
 33296                                  smX:	
 33297                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 33298 00002DF2 07                      	pop	es
 33299 00002DF3 59                      	pop	cx
 33300                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33301                                  	;pop	bx
 33302 00002DF4 C3                      	retn
 33303                                  
 33304                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33305                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 33306                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33307                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 33308                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 33309                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33310                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 33311                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33312                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 33313                                  ;
 33314                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 33315                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 33316                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 33317                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 33318                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 33319                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 33320                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 33321                                  ;       Endif
 33322                                  ;    Endif
 33323                                  ; Endif
 33324                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 33325                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 33326                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 33327                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 33328                                  ;    ENDIF
 33329                                  ; ENDIF
 33330                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33331                                  
 33332                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33333                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 33334                                  _hideUMB_:
 33335                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33336                                  	; ds = cs
 33337                                  
 33338                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33339                                  	;push	bx
 33340                                  	;push	dx
 33341 00002DF5 06                      	push	es
 33342                                  
 33343 00002DF6 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33344 00002DF8 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 33345 00002DFB 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 33346                                  
 33347 00002DFD 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 33348 00002DFF E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 33349 00002E02 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 33350                                  
 33351 00002E04 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 33352 00002E05 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 33353 00002E07 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 33354 00002E0A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 33355                                  
 33356 00002E0B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 33357 00002E0D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 33358                                  
 33359 00002E0F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 33360 00002E11 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 33361                                  
 33362 00002E13 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 33363 00002E15 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 33364 00002E18 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 33365                                  hu_10:	
 33366                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 33367                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 33368                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33369                                  ;isTiny:
 33370                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 33371                                  	;or	al,al
 33372 00002E1A 800E[161F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 33373 00002E1F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 33374                                  
 33375 00002E21 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 33376 00002E24 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 33377                                  
 33378 00002E26 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 33379 00002E28 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 33380                                  
 33381 00002E2A 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 33382 00002E2C E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 33383 00002E2F 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 33384                                  
 33385 00002E31 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33386                                  hu_30:	
 33387 00002E33 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33388                                  
 33389 00002E35 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 33390                                  
 33391 00002E38 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 33392 00002E3A 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 33393                                  
 33394 00002E3C 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 33395 00002E3E E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 33396                                  hu_X:	
 33397 00002E41 07                      	pop	es
 33398                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33399                                  	;pop	dx
 33400                                  	;pop	bx
 33401 00002E42 C3                      	retn
 33402                                  
 33403                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33404                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 33405                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33406                                  ; Entry:  None
 33407                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 33408                                  ; Error:  None
 33409                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 33410                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33411

 33422                                  uf10:
 33423 00002E49 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *

 33691                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33692                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too

 33870

 34004                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34005                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991)

 34007                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34008                                  
 34009                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34010                                  ;
 34011                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 34012                                  ;
 34013                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 34014                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 34015                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 34016                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 34017                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 34018                                  ;
 34019                                  ;	Output : none
 34020                                  ;
 34021                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 34022                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 34023                                  ;
 34024                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34025                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 34026                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 34027                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 34028                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 34029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34030                                  
 34031                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34032                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34033                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 34034                                  InitDevLoad:
 34035                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34036                                  	;push	es ; *
 34037                                  
 34038                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34039                                  	; ds = cs
 34040 00002FD4 803E[6B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34041                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 34042                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 34043 00002FD9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 34044                                  
 34045                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34046                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34047                                  ; %if 0
 34048                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34049 00002FDB 803E[5B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34050                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34051 00002FE0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 34052                                  
 34053                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 34054                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 34055                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 34056                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 34057                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 34058                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 34059                                  
 34060 00002FE2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 34061                                  
 34062 00002FE5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 34063 00002FE8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 34064 00002FEB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 34065 00002FEE 9C                      	pushf
 34066 00002FEF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 34067 00002FF2 9D                      	popf
 34068                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 34069                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 34070                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34071 00002FF3 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 34072                                  
 34073                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 34074                                  
 34075                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34076                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 34077                                  InitForConv:
 34078                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34079                                  	; ds = cs
 34080 00002FF5 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 34081                                  					;  current UMB ?
 34082 00002FF8 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 34083 00002FFA E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 34084 00002FFD E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 34085                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 34086 00003000 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 34087                                  					;  in low memory
 34088                                  InitForHi:
 34089                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34090                                  	; ds = cs
 34091                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 34092                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 34093                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 34094 00003002 A1[611F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 34095 00003005 8B16[5D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34096 00003009 0316[5F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 34097 0000300D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 34098                                  
 34099                                  InitForLo:
 34100                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34101                                  	; ds = cs
 34102                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 34103 0000300F C606[6B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34104                                  initforlo_x:
 34105                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34106                                  	; ds = cs
 34107                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 34108                                  					;  we are loading low
 34109                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 34110                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 34111 00003014 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 34112 00003017 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 34113                                  idl1:
 34114 0000301B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 34115                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34116                                  	; ds = cs
 34117                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 34118                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 34119                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 34120                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 34121 0000301E A3[4F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 34122 00003021 8916[511F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 34123 00003025 C706[531F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 34124 0000302B A3[551F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 34125                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34126                                  	;pop	es ; *
 34127 0000302E C3                      	retn
 34128                                  
 34129                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34130                                  ;
 34131                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 34132                                  ;
 34133                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 34134                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 34135                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 34136                                  ;		   current UMB
 34137                                  ;
 34138                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34139                                  
 34140                                  SpaceInUMB:
 34141                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34142                                  	; ds = cs
 34143                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 34144                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 34145                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 34146 0000302F A1[5F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 34147 00003032 0306[5D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 34148 00003036 2B06[611F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 34149                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34150                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 34151                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 34152                                  	;stc
 34153                                  	;retn
 34154                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34155 0000303A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 34156 0000303D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 34157                                  spcinumb1:
 34158 0000303F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 34159                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34160                                  	; ds = cs
 34161 00003040 3B06[4D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 34162                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 34163                                  spcinumb2:
 34164 00003044 C3                      	retn
 34165

 34169                                  ;

 34171                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 34172                                  ;

 34180                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8

 34186                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 34190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34191                                  ;
 34192                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 34193                                  ;
 34194                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 34195                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 34196                                  ;		 the device.
 34197                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 34198                                  ;
 34199                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 34200                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 34201                                  ;	UMB.
 34202                                  ;
 34203                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 34204                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 34205                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 34206                                  ;
 34207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34208                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34209                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 34210                                  
 34211                                  GetUMBForDev:
 34212                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34213                                  	; ds = cs
 34214 00003045 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 34215 00003048 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 34216 0000304B CD21                    	int	21h
 34217                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 34218                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 34219                                  
 34220 0000304D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 34221                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 34222                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34223 0000304F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 34224                                  
 34225 00003051 4B                      	dec	bx
 34226                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34227                                  	; ds = cs

 34229                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 34230 00003056 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 34231                                  
 34232 00003058 43                      	inc	bx
 34233                                  
 34234 00003059 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 34235 0000305C CD21                    	int	21h
 34236 0000305E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 34237                                  
 34238                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34239                                  	;dec	ax
 34240                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 34241                                  	;
 34242                                  PrepareMark:
 34243 00003060 1E                      	push	ds
 34244 00003061 48                      	dec	ax
 34245 00003062 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34246 00003064 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 34247 0000306A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 34248 00003070 40                      	inc	ax
 34249 00003071 1F                      	pop	ds
 34250                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34251                                  	; ds = cs
 34252                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 34253                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 34254                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 34255                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023

 34260                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34261                                  	; cf=0
 34262                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 34263 0000307C C3                      	retn
 34264                                  
 34265                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34266                                  %if 1
 34267                                  gufd_err:
 34268 0000307D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 34269                                  gufd_error:

 34271 00003081 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 34272 00003082 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 34273                                  %endif

 34276                                  %if 0

 34278                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0

 34280                                  	; ds = cs
 34281                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 34282                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax

 34293                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 34294                                  ;
 34295                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 34296                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 34297                                  ;
 34298                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 34299                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 34300                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 34301                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 34302                                  ;
 34303                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 34304                                  ;	completion of Device load.

 34306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34307

 34309                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)

 34319 0000308F 40                      	inc	ax

 34322                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 34323                                  
 34324 00003094 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 34325

 34328                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 34329 00003095 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]

 34331 00003099 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34332 0000309B FC                      	cld
 34333                                  dsm_again:

 34335 0000309D 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 34336 0000309F 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 34337 000030A1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34338 000030A3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 34339                                  isit_slash:

 34344                                  isit_null:

 34346 000030AF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 34347 000030B1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 34348

 34350 000030B6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 34351                                  dsm_next_char:

 34363                                  dsm_exit:

 34365 000030CC 5E                      	pop	si
 34366 000030CD 1F                      	pop	ds
 34367                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34368                                  	;pop	di
 34369 000030CE 07                      	pop	es
 34370 000030CF C3                      	retn
