 34824                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34825                                  ;
 34826                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34827                                  ;
 34828                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34829                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34830                                  ;
 34831                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 34832                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34833                                  ;
 34834                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34835                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34836                                  ;
 34837                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34838                                  
 34839                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34840                                  
 34841                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34842                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34843                                  
 34844                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34845                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34846                                  GetHexNum:
 34847 00003208 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34848 0000320A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34849                                  ghn_next:
 34850 0000320C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34851 0000320F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34852 00003212 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34853 00003214 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34854 00003217 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34855 00003219 50                      	push	ax
 34856 0000321A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34857 0000321C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34858 0000321F 58                      	pop	ax
 34859                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34860 00003220 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34861 00003223 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34862 00003225 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34863                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34864                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34865 00003228 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34866                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34867                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34868                                  ghn_shift1:
 34869 0000322A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34870 0000322C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34871 0000322E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34872 00003230 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34873 00003232 46                      	inc	si
 34874 00003233 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34875                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34876 00003235 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34877 00003238 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34878 0000323B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34879 0000323F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34880                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34881                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34882                                  ghn_shift2:
 34883 00003241 F8                      	clc
 34884 00003242 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34885 00003244 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34886 00003246 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34887 00003248 F8                      	clc
 34888 00003249 C3                      	retn
 34889                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34890                                  ghn_err:
 34891                                  gnib_err:
 34892 0000324A F9                      	stc
 34893                                  ghn_ret:
 34894                                  gnib_ret:
 34895 0000324B C3                      	retn
 34896                                  
 34897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34898                                  ;
 34899                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34900                                  ;
 34901                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34902                                  ;
 34903                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34904                                  ;
 34905                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34906                                  ;
 34907                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34908                                  
 34909                                  GetNibble:
 34910 0000324C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34911                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34912                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34913 0000324F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34914 00003251 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34915 00003254 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34916 00003256 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34917 00003259 C3                      	retn
 34918                                  is_it_hex:
 34919 0000325A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34920                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34921                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34922 0000325D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34923 0000325F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34924 00003262 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34925 00003264 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34926 00003267 C3                      	retn
 34927                                  
 34928                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34929                                  ;gnib_err:
 34930                                  ;	stc
 34931                                  ;gnib_ret:
 34932                                  ;	retn

 34939                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34940                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 34941

 34946                                  
 34947                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34948                                  ;
 34949                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34950                                  ;
 34951                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34952                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34953                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34954                                  ;			; DS = data
 34955                                  ;
 34956                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34957                                  ;
 34958                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34959                                  ;
 34960                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34961                                  
 34962                                  umb_insert:
 34963 00003268 1E                      	push	ds
 34964                                  
 34965                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34966                                  	; ds = cs
 34967                                  
 34968                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34969 00003269 8E1E[7A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34970                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34971 0000326D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34972 00003271 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34973 00003273 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34974                                  ui_next:
 34975 00003275 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34976                                  					;    new block
 34977 00003277 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34978                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34979                                  					;    last
 34980 00003279 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34981 0000327F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34982                                  					; N: get next block
 34983 00003281 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34984                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34985 00003283 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34986 00003286 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34987                                  
 34988                                  ui_insert:
 34989 00003288 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34990 0000328A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34991                                  
 34992 0000328B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34993 0000328D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34994                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34995 0000328F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34996                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34997 00003294 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34998                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34999 0000329A 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 35000                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 35001 0000329E C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35002                                  
 35003                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35004                                  
 35005 000032A4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35006 000032A6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35007 000032AC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 35008                                  					; mark as free
 35009 000032B3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 35010                                  					; start & end of new block
 35011 000032B6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 35012                                  
 35013                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 35014                                  	
 35015 000032BB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 35016 000032BD 43                      	inc	bx
 35017 000032BE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 35018 000032C0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 35019                                  
 35020                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 35021                                  					; this block
 35022 000032C1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 35023                                  	
 35024 000032C3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35025 000032C9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35026 000032D0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35027 000032D4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35028                                  
 35029 000032DB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 35030                                  
 35031                                  ui_append:
 35032                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 35033 000032DD 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 35034 000032E2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 35035                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 35036                                  					; block for the next arena.
 35037                                  	; 13/05/2019
 35038 000032E8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35039                                  
 35040 000032EE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 35041 000032F0 40                      	inc	ax
 35042 000032F1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 35043                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 35044 000032F3 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35045                                  
 35046 000032F5 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 35047                                  
 35048 000032F7 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35049 000032FD 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35050 00003304 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35051 00003308 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 35052                                  
 35053                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35054 0000330F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35055 00003311 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 35056 00003317 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 35057                                  					; mark as free
 35058 0000331E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35059 0000331F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35060                                  ui_done:
 35061                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 35062 00003324 1F                      	pop	ds
 35063                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 35064                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35065                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 35066 00003325 C3                      	retn
 35067

 35069                                  ;
 35070                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 35071                                  ;
 35072                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 35073                                  ;
 35074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35075                                  
 35076                                  AllocUMB:
 35077                                  	; 31/12/2022

 35079 00003326 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 35080 00003329 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 35081                                  au_next:
 35082 0000332B E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 35083 0000332E 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 35084 00003330 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 35085 00003333 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 35086                                  au_coalesce:
 35087                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35088                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 35089                                  ;au_exit:
 35090                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 35091                                  ;	; ds = cs
 35092                                  ;	retn
 35093                                  
 35094                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35095                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 35096                                  
 35097                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35098                                  
 35099                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35100                                  
 35101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35102                                  ;
 35103                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 35104                                  ;
 35105                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 35106                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 35107                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 35108                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 35109                                  ;
 35110                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35111                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 35112                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 35113                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 35114                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 35115                                  ;
 35116                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35117                                  
 35118                                  umb_coalesce:
 35119                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35120                                  	; ds = cs
 35121 00003335 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 35122                                  
 35123 00003336 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 35124                                  
 35125                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35126                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35127 00003338 8E06[7A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35128 0000333C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 35129                                  uc_nextfree:
 35130 00003341 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35131 00003343 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35132                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 35133 00003345 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 35134 0000334A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 35135                                  					; N: get next arena
 35136 0000334C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35137 0000334F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35138 00003351 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 35139                                  uc_again:
 35140 00003353 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35141 00003356 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35142                                  uc_check:
 35143 00003358 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 35144 0000335D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 35145                                  					; Y: coalesce
 35146 0000335F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 35147 00003364 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 35148                                  	;add	[3],cx
 35149 00003365 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 35150 00003369 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 35151 0000336C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 35152 0000336E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 35153                                  
 35154                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35155                                  ;uc_done:
 35156                                  	;retn
 35157

 35171                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35172                                  	; ds = cs
 35173                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 35174 00003379 8C06[7A1F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 35175 0000337D B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 35176 00003380 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 35177                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 35178                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 35179 00003382 891E[631F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 35180 00003386 8C06[651F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 35181                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35182 0000338A 803E[791F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 35183                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 35184                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 35185                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35187 00003391 E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 35188                                  	;jc	short iau_err
 35189                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35190 00003394 7207                    	jc	short iau_err2  ; cf=1
 35191                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35192                                  	; ds = cs
 35193 00003396 C606[791F]FF            	mov	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 35194                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 35195                                  ia_1:
 35196                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35197                                  	; cf=0
 35198                                  	;clc
 35199 0000339B C3                      	retn
 35200                                  iau_err:

 35202                                  iau_err2:

 35205                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35206                                  ;
 35207                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 35208                                  ;
 35209                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 35210                                  ;
 35211                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 35212                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 35213                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 35214                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 35215                                  ;				NC
 35216                                  ;			  else 
 35217                                  ;				CY
 35218                                  ;
 35219                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 35220                                  ;
 35221                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 35229                                  					;   possible

 35305                                  	; ds = cs

 35310                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 35311

 35318

 35321

 35328

 35331

 35340                                  					; mark as free

 35342 00003409 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 35351                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 35372                                  	; 09/12/2022

 35378

 35382                                  	; 11/12/2022

 35398                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 35399                                  ;
 35400                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 35401                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 35402                                  ;
 35403                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35404                                  
 35405                                  ShrinkUMB:
 35406                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35407                                  	; ds = cs
 35408 0000343C 833E[5D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 35409                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 35410 00003441 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 35411 00003443 06                      	push	es
 35412                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35413                                  	;push	bx
 35414                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35415                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 35416                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35417                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35418 00003444 8B1E[611F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 35419 00003448 2B1E[5D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 35420 0000344C 8E06[5D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 35421                                  	
 35422 00003450 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 35423 00003453 CD21                    	int	21h
 35424                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 35425                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 35426                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 35427 00003455 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35428 00003457 48                      	dec	ax
 35429 00003458 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35430 0000345A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 35431                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35432                                  	;pop	bx
 35433 00003461 07                      	pop	es

 35452                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 35453 0000346A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 35454                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35455 0000346C 8E06[7A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35456                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 35457 00003470 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35458 00003475 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 35459                                  ulu_next:
 35460 0000347A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 35461 0000347D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 35462 0000347F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 35463 00003481 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 35464 00003483 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35465 00003485 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 35466                                  ulu_found:

 35468 00003487 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35469                                  ulu_x:

 35471 0000348D 1F                      	pop	ds
 35472 0000348E C3                      	retn

 35474                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35475                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 35476                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35477                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35478                                  
 35479                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35480                                  ;
 35481                                  ; Summary:
 35482                                  ;
 35483                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 35484                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 35485                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 35486                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 35487                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 35488                                  ;
 35489                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 35490                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 35491                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 35492                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 35493                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 35494                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 35495                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 35496                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 35497                                  ;
 35498                                  ; Example:
 35499                                  ;
 35500                                  ;   [menu]
 35501                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 35502                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 35503                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 35504                                  ;
 35505                                  ;   [network]
 35506                                  ;   include misc
 35507                                  ;   device=foo
 35508                                  ;
 35509                                  ;   [misc]
 35510                                  ;   device=bar
 35511                                  ;   include alternate
 35512                                  ;
 35513                                  ;   [alternate]
 35514                                  ;   device=tar
 35515                                  ;
 35516                                  ;
 35517                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 35518                                  ;
 35519                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 35520                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 35521                                  ;
 35522                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 35523                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 35524                                  ;   following order:
 35525                                  ;
 35526                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 35527                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 35528                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 35529                                  ;
 35530                                  
 35531                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 35532                                  
 35533                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 35534                                  
 35535                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 35536                                  
 35537                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 35538                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 35539                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 35540                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 35541                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 35542                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 35543                                  
 35544                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35545                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35546                                  
 35547                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 35548                                  
 35549                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35550                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 35551                                  
 35552 0000348F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 35553

 35556                                  ; procedure : setparms

 35558                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 35559                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.

 35565 00003491 50                      	push	ax
 35566 00003492 53                      	push	bx

 35568 00003494 52                      	push	dx
 35569                                  
 35570 00003495 0E                      	push	cs
 35571 00003496 1F                      	pop	ds
 35572                                  
 35573 00003497 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35574 00003499 8A1E[4B49]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 35575                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35576 0000349D 43                      	inc	bx
 35577                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 35578                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 35579 0000349E BA[2348]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 35580                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 35581                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 35582                                  	; 04/07/2023
 35583 000034A1 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 35584                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 35585                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 35586                                  	; 04/07/2023
 35587 000034A4 B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 35588 000034A7 CD21                    	int	21h
 35589                                  
 35590                                  ; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35591 000034A9 8A26[4C49]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 35592                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 35593 000034AD A0[3748]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35594 000034B0 8A0E[4B49]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 35595                                  ;
 35596                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35597                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 35598                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 35599                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 35600                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35601                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 35602                                  ;
 35603                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35604                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35605                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 35606                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 35607                                  ;
 35608                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35609                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35610                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35611                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 35612                                  ;	;test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35613                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 35614                                  ;	
 35615                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 35616                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35617                                  	;mov	cl,[drive]
 35618                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35619                                  	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35620                                  	;mov	ds,ax

 35626 000034BC 7408                    	jz	short not_ec35

 35634 000034C0 D2E4                    	shl	ah,cl
 35635 000034C2 0826[2005]              	or	[ec35_flag],ah

 35640                                  not_ec35:

 35642                                  ;	sectors per track than any old ones.

 35688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35689                                  ;
 35690                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35691                                  ;
 35692                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35693                                  ;
 35694                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35695                                  
 35696                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35697                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35698                                  
 35699                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35700                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35701                                  parseline:
 35702                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35703                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35704                                  
 35705                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35706                                  
 35707                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35708                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35709                                  
 35710                                  nextswtch:
 35711                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35712                                  	je	short done_line
 35713                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35714                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35715                                  
 35716                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35717                                  
 35718                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35719                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35720                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35721                                  	je	short getparm
 35722                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35723                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35724                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35725                                  swterr:
 35726                                  	retn
 35727                                  
 35728                                  getparm:
 35729                                  	call	check_switch
 35730                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35731                                  	jc	short swterr
 35732                                  getnext:
 35733                                  	call	getchr
 35734                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35735                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35736                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35737                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35738                                  ;swterr:
 35739                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35740                                  
 35741                                  done_line:
 35742                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35746                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35747                                  	;jmp	short exitpl

 35749                                  	retn

 35751                                  okay:

 35758                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35764                                  ;exitpl:
 35765                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35766                                  	; ds = cs
 35767                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35768                                  	retn
 35769                                  put_back:

 35771                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35772                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35773

 35778                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35779                                  ;
 35780                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35781                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35782                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35783                                  ; error.
 35784                                  ;
 35785                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35786                                  
 35787                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35788                                  
 35789                                  err_swtch:
 35790 000034F1 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35791                                  err_check:
 35792 000034F3 F9                      	stc
 35793                                  err_chk:
 35794                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35795 000034F4 C3                      	retn
 35796                                  
 35797                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 35804 000034FC 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'

 35859                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35860                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35861

 35881                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.

 35904 00003552 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35905

 35907

 35911                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35912                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35913                                  	; cf=0
 35914 00003557 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35915                                  try_t:

 35917 0000355A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value

 35935 0000356A A3[4949]                	mov	[slim],ax

 35937                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35938                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35939                                  	; cf=0

 35941

 35943

 36053                                  ;
 36054                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 36055                                  ;
 36056                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 36057                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 36058                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 36059                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 36060                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 36061                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 36062                                  ;
 36063                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 36064                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 36065                                  ;
 36066                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 36067                                  ;
 36068                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36069                                  
 36070                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36071                                  
 36072                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36073                                  
 36074                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36075                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 36076                                  
 36077                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36078                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 36079                                  
 36080                                  setdeviceparameters:
 36081                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36082                                  	; ds = cs
 36083                                  
 36084 000035B4 06                      	push	es
 36085                                  
 36086 000035B5 0E                      	push	cs
 36087 000035B6 07                      	pop	es
 36088                                  
 36089 000035B7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 36090 000035B9 8A1E[2448]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 36091 000035BD 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 36092 000035C0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 36093                                  
 36094 000035C2 C706[2748]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 36095                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 36096                                  got_80:
 36097 000035C8 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 36098 000035CA 8BB7[CC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 36099                                  
 36100                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 36101                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36102 000035CE BF[2A48]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 36103 000035D1 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 36114 000035D8 F606[4C49]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h

 36116 000035DD 7406                    	jz	short see_heads

 36119                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 36120 000035E2 A3[3748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 36121

 36129                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 36130 000035EF A3[3948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 36131                                  
 36132                                  heads_not_altered:
 36133                                  
 36134                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 36135                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 36136                                  
 36137                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 36138                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36139                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 36140                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36141 000035F2 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 36142 000035F5 A2[2C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 36143                                  
 36144 000035F8 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 36145                                  
 36146                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 36147                                  
 36148                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 36149                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36150 000035FA 8A3E[3448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 36151                                  	
 36152                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36153                                  	; ax = 2
 36154 000035FE 3906[3948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 36155                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 36156 00003602 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 36157                                  
 36158 00003604 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 36159                                  
 36160                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 36161                                  
 36162 00003606 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 36163                                  
 36164                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 36165                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 36166                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 36167                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 36168                                  
 36169                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 36170                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 36171                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 36172                                  
 36173 00003608 833E[3748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 36174 0000360D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 36175 0000360F 833E[2748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 36176 00003614 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 36177                                  
 36178                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 36179                                  
 36180 00003616 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 36181                                  
 36182                                  ;	check for 320K
 36183                                  
 36184                                  not_144m:
 36185 00003618 833E[2748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 36186 0000361D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 36187 0000361F 833E[3748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 36188 00003624 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 36189                                  
 36190 00003626 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 36191 00003628 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 36192                                  
 36193                                  only_one_head:
 36194                                  
 36195                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 36196                                  
 36197 0000362A 803E[2448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 36198 0000362F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 36199                                  
 36200                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 36201                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 36202                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 36203                                  
 36204 00003631 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 36205 00003633 833E[3748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 36206                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36207 00003638 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 36208                                  
 36209 0000363A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 36210                                  
 36211                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 36212                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 36213                                  
 36214                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 36215                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36216                                  	; ax = 2
 36217 0000363C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 36218 0000363D A2[2C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 36219                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 36220                                  
 36221                                  got_correct_mediad:

 36682                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 36683 000037FD 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 36684 000037FF 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 36685 00003801 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 36686 00003803 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 36687 00003805 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 36688 00003807 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 36689 0000380C AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 36690 0000380D FE06[8F34]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 36691                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 36692                                  					; inserted
 36693 00003811 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 36694                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 36695                                  
 36696 00003813 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 36697 00003815 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 36698 00003817 EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 36699                                  
 36700                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 36701                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36702                                  	; ds = cs
 36703 00003819 803E[8F34]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 36704                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 36705 0000381E 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 36706 00003820 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 36707 00003825 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 36708                                  					; M051 - End
 36709                                  org1_brdg:

 36735                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)

 36747                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 36748                                  	;inc	si

 36752                                  noget:
 36753 00003848 59                      	pop	cx
 36754                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36755                                  	; ds = cs
 36756                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 36757                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 36758 00003849 893E[5603]              	mov	[count],di
 36759 0000384D 893E[5803]              	mov	[org_count],di

 36784                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36785                                  ;
 36786                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36787                                  ;
 36788                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36789                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36790                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36791                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36792                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36793                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36794                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36795                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36796                                  ;
 36797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36798                                  
 36799                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36800                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36801                                  
 36802                                  skip_comment:
 36803 0000385C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36804                                  
 36805                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36806                                  	; ds = cs	
 36807                                  
 36808 0000385E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36809                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36810 00003863 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36811                                  
 36812 00003865 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36813                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36814 0000386A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36815                                  
 36816 0000386C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36817                                  	
 36818 0000386F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36819                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36820 00003873 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36821                                  
 36822 00003875 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36823                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36824 0000387A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36825                                  
 36826 0000387C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36827                                  	
 36828 00003880 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36829                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36830 00003884 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36831                                  skip_cmmt:
 36832 00003886 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36833 00003888 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36834 0000388B 46                      	inc	si
 36835 0000388C 49                      	dec	cx
 36836 0000388D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36837 0000388F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36838                                  no_commt:
 36839 00003891 C3                      	retn

 36850                                  ;
 36851                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36852                                  ;
 36853                                  ;   INPUT
 36854                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36855                                  ;
 36856                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36857                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36858                                  ;
 36859                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36860                                  ;       All
 36861                                  ;
 36862                                  ;   HISTORY
 36863                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36864                                  ;
 36865                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36866                                  
 36867                                  kbd_read:
 36868 00003892 F606[EF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36869 00003897 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36870                                  
 36871 00003899 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36872 0000389A 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36873 0000389C 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36874                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36875                                  kbd_loop:
 36876 0000389E B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36877 000038A0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36878 000038A2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36879 000038A4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36880 000038A6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36881 000038A8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36882 000038AA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36883 000038AC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36884                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36885                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36886 000038AF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36887                                  
 36888 000038B4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36889 000038B6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36890                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36891 000038B8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36892                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36893 000038B9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36894 000038BB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36895 000038BD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36896 000038BF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36897 000038C1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36898 000038C3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36899 000038C4 43                              inc     bx
 36900                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36901 000038C5 800E[F346]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36902                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36903 000038CA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36904 000038CC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36905 000038CE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36906 000038D0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36907 000038D2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36908                                  
 36909                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36910 000038D4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36911 000038D7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36912                                  	
 36913 000038D9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36914 000038DC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36915                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36916 000038DE BA[874B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36917 000038E1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36918                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36919 000038E4 800E[F346]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36920 000038E9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36921                                  kbd_notf5:
 36922                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36923 000038EB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36924 000038EE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36925                                  
 36926 000038F0 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36927 000038F3 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36928                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36929 000038F5 BA[C54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36930 000038F8 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36931 000038FB B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36932 000038FD 881E[F346]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36933                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36934 00003901 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36935 00003903 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36936 00003905 C606[F946]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36937 0000390A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36938 0000390C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36939                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36940 0000390E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36941 00003911 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36942                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36943 00003913 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36944 00003916 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36945 00003917 C3                              retn			;
 36946                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36947 00003918 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36948 00003919 C3                              retn			;
 36949                                  
 36950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36951                                  ;
 36952                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36953                                  ;
 36954                                  ;   INPUT
 36955                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36956                                  ;
 36957                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36958                                  ;       None
 36959                                  ;
 36960                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36961                                  ;       None
 36962                                  ;
 36963                                  ;   HISTORY
 36964                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36965                                  ;
 36966                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36967                                  
 36968                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36969                                  
 36970                                  set_numlock:
 36971                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36972                                  	;push	ax
 36973 0000391A 1E                              push    ds
 36974 0000391B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36975 0000391D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36976 0000391F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36977 00003922 2E3B06[624B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36978 00003927 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36979 00003929 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36980 0000392E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36981                                  not_off:
 36982 00003930 2E3B06[604B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36983 00003935 F9                              stc
 36984 00003936 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36985 00003938 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36986                                  set_done:
 36987 0000393D 1F                              pop     ds
 36988                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36989                                  	;pop	ax
 36990 0000393E C3                              retn
 36991                                  
 36992                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36993                                  
 36994                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36995                                  ;
 36996                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36997                                  ;
 36998                                  ;   INPUT
 36999                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 37000                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 37001                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 37002                                  ;
 37003                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37004                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 37005                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 37006                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 37007                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 37008                                  ;
 37009                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37010                                  ;       All
 37011                                  ;
 37012                                  ;   NOTES
 37013                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 37014                                  ;
 37015                                  ;   HISTORY
 37016                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37017                                  ;
 37018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37019                                  
 37020                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37021                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 37022                                  
 37023                                  menu_check:
 37024                                  
 37025                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 37026                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 37027                                  
 37028 0000393F 51                              push    cx              ;
 37029 00003940 56                              push    si              ;
 37030 00003941 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 37031                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 37032 00003943 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 37033 00003946 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 37034 00003948 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 37035 0000394A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 37036 0000394C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 37037 0000394D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37038                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 37039 0000394F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 37040 00003951 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 37041 00003953 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 37042 00003955 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 37043 00003957 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 37044 0000395A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 37045 0000395F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37046                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 37047 00003961 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 37048 00003963 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 37049                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 37050 00003965 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 37051                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 37052 00003968 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 37053 0000396A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 37054 0000396C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 37055 0000396E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 37056 00003970 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 37057 00003973 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 37058 00003975 3A06[A91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 37059 00003979 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 37060 0000397B 800E[EF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37061 00003980 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37062                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 37063 00003982 3A06[B51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 37064 00003986 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 37065 00003988 800E[EF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 37066 0000398D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37067                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 37068 0000398F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37069 00003992 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 37070                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 37071 00003994 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37072 00003995 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37073                                  
 37074                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 37075                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 37076                                  
 37077 00003996 F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37078 0000399B 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 37079                                  ;
 37080                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 37081                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 37082                                  ;
 37083 0000399D E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 37084 000039A0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 37085 000039A2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 37086                                  
 37087                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 37088                                  
 37089                                  menu_search:
 37090 000039A5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 37091 000039A7 BF[3447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 37092 000039AA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 37093 000039AD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 37094 000039AF C606[2C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 37095 000039B4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 37096                                  
 37097                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 37098                                  
 37099                                  menu_color:
