 37100 000039B7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 37101 000039B8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 37102                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 37103                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37104                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 37105 000039B9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 37106 000039BC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 37107 000039BF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 37108                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 37109                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 37110                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 37111                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 37112 000039C1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 37113 000039C3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 37114 000039C6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 37115 000039C8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 37116 000039CB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 37117 000039CE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 37118                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37119                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 37120 000039D0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 37121 000039D2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 37122 000039D4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 37123                                  check_color:
 37124 000039D6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 37125 000039D8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 37126 000039DA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37127                                  set_color:
 37128 000039DD 8816[EA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 37129 000039E1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 37130 000039E2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 37131 000039E3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 37132                                  
 37133                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 37134                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 37135                                  
 37136                                  menu_found:
 37137 000039E6 C606[F446]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 37138                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 37139 000039EB C606[F846]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37140 000039F0 8026[F346]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 37141                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37142 000039F5 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 37143 000039F7 8916[F646]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 37144                                  
 37145 000039FB E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 37146                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37147                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 37148                                  
 37149                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 37150                                  
 37151                                  menu_process:
 37152 000039FE E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 37153 00003A01 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 37154 00003A03 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37155 00003A05 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 37156 00003A07 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 37157 00003A09 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37158 00003A0B 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 37159 00003A0D 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 37160 00003A0F 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 37161 00003A11 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 37162 00003A13 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 37163 00003A15 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 37164 00003A17 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 37165 00003A19 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 37166 00003A1B 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 37167 00003A1D 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 37168 00003A1F 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 37169 00003A21 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 37170 00003A24 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 37171 00003A26 F9                              stc                     ;
 37172 00003A27 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 37173 00003A2A EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37174                                  menu_numlock:
 37175 00003A2C E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 37176 00003A2F EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37177                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 37178 00003A31 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 37179                                  
 37180                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 37181                                  
 37182                                  menu_default:
 37183 00003A33 8936[F646]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 37184 00003A37 803E[F946]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 37185 00003A3C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 37186 00003A3E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 37187 00003A41 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 37188 00003A43 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 37189 00003A46 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 37190 00003A48 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 37191 00003A4A E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 37192 00003A4D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 37193                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 37194 00003A50 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 37195 00003A52 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 37196                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 37197 00003A54 881E[F846]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 37198                                  timeout_skip:
 37199 00003A58 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37200                                  
 37201                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 37202                                  
 37203                                  menu_item:
 37204                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 37205 00003A5A 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 37206 00003A5D 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 37207 00003A5F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 37208 00003A61 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 37209 00003A64 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 37210 00003A66 F9                              stc                     ;
 37211 00003A67 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 37212 00003A6A EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 37213                                  
 37214                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 37215                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 37216                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 37217                                  
 37218                                  menu_itemfound:
 37219 00003A6C 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 37220 00003A6D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 37221 00003A6F 8887[FA46]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 37222 00003A73 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 37223                                  
 37224                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 37225                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 37226                                  ;   description...
 37227                                  
 37228 00003A75 89B7[0447]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 37229 00003A79 89B7[1847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 37230 00003A7D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 37231 00003A7F E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 37232 00003A82 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 37233 00003A84 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 37234 00003A87 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 37235 00003A89 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 37236 00003A8B 89BF[1847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 37237                                  
 37238                                  menu_nextitem:
 37239 00003A8F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37240 00003A92 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 37241                                  
 37242                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 37243                                  
 37244                                  menu_getdefault:
 37245 00003A95 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 37246 00003A97 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 37247 00003A99 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 37248 00003A9B E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 37249                                  menu_valid:
 37250 00003A9E 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 37251 00003AA0 8816[F546]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 37252 00003AA4 8B3E[F646]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 37253 00003AA8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 37254 00003AAA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 37255 00003AAC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 37256                                  menu_chkdefault:
 37257 00003AAD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37258 00003AAE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37259 00003AB0 8BB7[0447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37260 00003AB4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 37261 00003AB7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37262 00003AB8 06                              push    es              ;
 37263 00003AB9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37264 00003ABA E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 37265 00003ABD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37266 00003ABE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37267 00003ABF 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 37268 00003AC1 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37269 00003AC2 3A1E[F546]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 37270 00003AC6 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 37271                                  menu_nodefault:
 37272 00003AC8 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 37273                                  menu_setdefault:
 37274 00003ACA 881E[F446]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 37275                                  
 37276                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 37277                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 37278                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 37279                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 37280                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 37281                                  ;   with no timeout)
 37282                                  
 37283 00003ACE 803E[F846]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 37284 00003AD3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 37285 00003AD5 F606[F346]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 37286 00003ADA 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 37287 00003ADC E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 37288                                  
 37289                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 37290                                  
 37291                                  menu_display:
 37292 00003ADF B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 37293 00003AE1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37294 00003AE3 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 37295 00003AE5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37296 00003AE7 06                              push    es              ;
 37297 00003AE8 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 37298 00003AEB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 37299 00003AED 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 37300 00003AF1 A3[F146]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 37301 00003AF4 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 37302 00003AF8 A2[F046]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 37303 00003AFB A1[EB46]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 37304 00003AFE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37305 00003B00 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 37306 00003B03 8A3E[EA46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 37307 00003B07 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 37308                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 37309 00003B09 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 37310 00003B0E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 37311                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 37312 00003B10 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 37313 00003B15 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 37314 00003B17 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 37315 00003B19 8A36[EE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 37316                                  menu_clear:
 37317 00003B1D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 37318 00003B1F 07                              pop     es              ;
 37319 00003B20 8836[EE46]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 37320 00003B24 BA[024C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 37321 00003B27 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 37322                                  
 37323 00003B2A F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37324 00003B2F 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 37325 00003B31 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37326 00003B35 8A36[EE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 37327 00003B39 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 37328 00003B3B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 37329 00003B3D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37330 00003B3F BA[504C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 37331 00003B42 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 37332 00003B45 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 37333 00003B47 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37334 00003B49 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 37335 00003B4C 8816[ED46]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 37336                                  
 37337                                  menu_nostatus:
 37338 00003B50 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 37339                                  menu_disploop:
 37340 00003B53 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 37341 00003B56 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 37342 00003B57 3A1E[F546]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 37343 00003B5B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 37344                                  
 37345                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 37346                                  
 37347 00003B5D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 37348 00003B5F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37349 00003B61 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 37350 00003B64 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37351 00003B68 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 37352 00003B6A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37353                                  
 37354 00003B6C BA[3D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 37355 00003B6F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 37356 00003B72 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 37357 00003B75 BA[0E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 37358 00003B78 E84609                          call    print           ;
 37359 00003B7B FF36[EF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 37360 00003B7F 800E[EF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37361 00003B84 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 37362 00003B87 8F06[EF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 37363                                  
 37364                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 37365                                  
 37366                                  menu_autoselect:
 37367 00003B8B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 37368 00003B8E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 37369 00003B90 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 37370                                  menu_abort:
 37371 00003B93 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 37372 00003B95 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 37373                                  
 37374                                  normal_boot:
 37375 00003B98 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 37376 00003B9B 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 37377 00003B9D 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 37378 00003BA1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37379 00003BA3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 37380                                  
 37381                                  not_topmenu:
 37382 00003BA6 80BF[FA46]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37383 00003BAB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 37384 00003BAD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37385 00003BAF 8BBF[0447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37386 00003BB3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 37387 00003BB6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37388 00003BB8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 37389 00003BBA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 37390                                  
 37391                                  not_submenu:
 37392 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 37393 00003BBF 8B9F[0447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37394                                  
 37395                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 37396                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 37397                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 37398                                  
 37399                                  no_selection:
 37400 00003BC3 891E[F646]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 37401 00003BC7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 37402 00003BCB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37403 00003BCD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37404 00003BCE 8E1E[A614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 37405 00003BD2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37406                                  
 37407                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 37408                                  ;
 37409                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 37410                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 37411                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 37412                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 37413                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 37414                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 37415                                  ;
 37416                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 37417                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 37418                                  
 37419                                  copyblock_loop:
 37420 00003BD4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 37421 00003BD5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 37422 00003BD8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37423 00003BD9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37424                                  
 37425                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 37426                                  
 37427                                  copyblock_begin:
 37428                                  
 37429                                  ; 10/09/2023
 37430                                  %if 0
 37431                                          push    ax              ;
 37432                                          push    cx              ;
 37433                                          push    si              ;
 37434                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 37435                                          mov     di,szCommon
 37436                                          push    ds              ;
 37437                                          push    cs              ;
 37438                                          pop     ds              ;
 37439                                          call    comp_names      ;
 37440                                          pop     ds              ;
 37441                                          pop     di              ;
 37442                                          pop     si              ;
 37443                                          pop     cx              ;
 37444                                          pop     ax              ;
 37445                                          je	short copyblock_check
 37446                                  %endif
 37447                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37448 00003BDB 57                      	push	di
 37449 00003BDC BF[3947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 37450 00003BDF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 37451 00003BE2 5F                      	pop	di
 37452 00003BE3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 37453                                  
 37454 00003BE5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 37455 00003BE7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 37456 00003BE9 57                              push    di              ;
 37457 00003BEA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 37458 00003BEC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37459 00003BED 06                              push    es              ;
 37460 00003BEE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37461 00003BEF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 37462 00003BF2 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37463 00003BF3 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37464                                  copyblock_check:
 37465 00003BF4 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37466 00003BF6 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 37467 00003BF8 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37468 00003BFB EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 37469                                  
 37470                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 37471 00003BFD E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 37472 00003C00 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 37473 00003C03 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37474 00003C05 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37475 00003C07 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 37476 00003C09 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 37477 00003C0B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 37478                                  ;
 37479                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 37480                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 37481                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 37482                                  ;
 37483                                  move_config:
 37484 00003C0D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 37485 00003C0F 51                              push    cx              ;
 37486                                  ;
 37487                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 37488                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 37489                                  ;
 37490                                   	;mov	cx,7
 37491 00003C10 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 37492 00003C13 BE[2C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 37493 00003C16 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 37494                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 37495                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 37496                                  copy_boot: 
 37497                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 37498 00003C17 2E                              cs
 37499 00003C18 AC                      	lodsb
 37500 00003C19 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 37501 00003C1B 47                              inc     di              ;
 37502 00003C1C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 37503                                  
 37504 00003C1E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 37505                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 37506                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37507 00003C1F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 37508 00003C21 2E8B36[F646]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 37509 00003C26 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 37510 00003C28 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 37511 00003C2A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 37512 00003C2B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37513 00003C2C BE[3947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 37514 00003C2F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 37515 00003C32 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 37516 00003C35 7406                            je	short l2	;
 37517 00003C37 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37518 00003C39 46                              inc     si              ;
 37519 00003C3A 47                              inc     di              ;
 37520 00003C3B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 37521 00003C3D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 37522 00003C40 07                              pop     es              ;
 37523                                  
 37524                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 37525                                  
 37526 00003C41 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37527 00003C43 2E893E[A414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37528 00003C48 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37529 00003C4A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 37530                                  
 37531 00003C4B 51                              push    cx              ;
 37532 00003C4C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 37533 00003C4E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37534 00003C4F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 37535 00003C51 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37536                                  
 37537                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 37538                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 37539                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 37540                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 37541                                  ;   is empty.
 37542                                  
 37543 00003C52 06                              push    es              ;
 37544 00003C53 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37545 00003C55 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 37546 00003C56 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 37547 00003C5C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37548 00003C5F 07                              pop     es
 37549                                  
 37550                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 37551                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 37552                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 37553                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 37554                                  
 37555                                  menu_done:
 37556 00003C60 803E[EB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 37557 00003C65 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 37558 00003C67 06                              push    es              ;
 37559 00003C68 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 37560 00003C6B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37561 00003C6D A1[F146]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 37562 00003C70 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 37563 00003C74 A0[F046]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 37564 00003C77 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 37565 00003C7B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37566                                  menu_exit:
 37567 00003C7C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 37568 00003C80 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 37569                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 37570                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 37571                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 37572                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 37573 00003C84 C3                      	retn
 37574                                  
 37575                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 37576                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 37577                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 37578                                  
 37579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37580                                  ;
 37581                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37582                                  ;
 37583                                  ;   INPUT
 37584                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 37585                                  ;
 37586                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37587                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 37588                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 37589                                  ;
 37590                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37591                                  ;       None
 37592                                  ;
 37593                                  ;   NOTES
 37594                                  ;       None
 37595                                  ;
 37596                                  ;   HISTORY
 37597                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37598                                  ;
 37599                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37600                                  
 37601                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37602                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37603                                  
 37604                                  copy_envvar:
 37605 00003C85 51                              push    cx              ;
 37606 00003C86 56                              push    si              ;
 37607 00003C87 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37608 00003C88 06                              push    es              ;
 37609 00003C89 06                              push    es              ;
 37610 00003C8A 8E06[A614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37611 00003C8E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37612                                  
 37613                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37614                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37615                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37616                                  ;
 37617                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37618                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37619                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37620                                  
 37621 00003C8F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37622                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37623 00003C91 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37624 00003C92 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37625                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37626 00003C94 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37627 00003C96 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37628                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37629 00003C98 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37630 00003C9A 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37631                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37632 00003C9C 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37633 00003C9E 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37634 00003C9F 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37635 00003CA1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37636 00003CA3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37637 00003CA5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37638 00003CA7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37639 00003CA9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37640 00003CAA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37641                                  copy_varsrch:
 37642 00003CAC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37643 00003CAF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37644 00003CB1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37645 00003CB3 51                              push    cx              ;
 37646 00003CB4 56                              push    si              ;
 37647 00003CB5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37648 00003CB7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37649 00003CB8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37650 00003CB9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37651 00003CBB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37652 00003CBF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37653                                  
 37654                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37655                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37656                                  
 37657 00003CC1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37658 00003CC4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37659 00003CC6 56                              push    si              ;
 37660 00003CC7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37661 00003CC9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37662 00003CCB 2E8B0E[A414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37663 00003CD0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37664                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37665                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37666                                  
 37667 00003CD2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37668 00003CD3 26                      	es	; 26h
 37669 00003CD4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37670                                  
 37671 00003CD5 5E                      	pop     si
 37672                                  copy_envprep:
 37673 00003CD6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37674 00003CD9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37675 00003CDB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37676 00003CDE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37677                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37678                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37679                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37680 00003CE0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37681 00003CE1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37682 00003CE3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37683 00003CE5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37684 00003CE7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37685 00003CE9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37686 00003CEA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37687                                  
 37688                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37689 00003CEC 51                              push    cx              ;
 37690 00003CED B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37691 00003CF0 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37692 00003CF2 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37693 00003CF3 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37694                                  
 37695                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37696                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37697                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37698                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37699                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37700                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37701                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37702                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37703                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37704                                  
 37705                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37706 00003CF5 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37707 00003CF7 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37708                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37709 00003CF8 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37710 00003CFB 2E893E[A414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37711                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37712 00003D00 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37713                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37714 00003D01 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37715 00003D02 07                              pop     es              ;
 37716 00003D03 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37717 00003D04 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37718 00003D05 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37719                                  
 37720                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37721 00003D06 C3                              retn
 37722                                  
 37723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37724                                  ;
 37725                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37726                                  ;
 37727                                  ;   INPUT
 37728                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37729                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37730                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37731                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37732                                  ;
 37733                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37734                                  ;       Same as above
 37735                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37736                                  ;
 37737                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37738                                  ;       All
 37739                                  ;
 37740                                  ;   NOTES
 37741                                  ;       None
 37742                                  ;
 37743                                  ;   HISTORY
 37744                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37745                                  ;
 37746                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37747                                  
 37748                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37749                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37750                                  
 37751                                  copy_block:
 37752 00003D07 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37753 00003D0A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37754 00003D0C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37755 00003D0E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37756 00003D10 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37757                                  
 37758 00003D12 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37759 00003D14 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37760 00003D16 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37761                                  
 37762                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37763                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37764                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37765                                  
 37766 00003D18 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37767 00003D1D 57                              push    di              ;
 37768                                  
 37769 00003D1E BF[3447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37770 00003D21 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37771 00003D24 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37772                                  
 37773 00003D26 BF[3947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37774 00003D29 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37775 00003D2C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37776                                  
 37777 00003D2E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37778 00003D30 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37779 00003D33 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37780                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37781                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37782 00003D35 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37783 00003D37 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37784 00003D38 51                              push    cx              ;
 37785 00003D39 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37786 00003D3B 56                              push    si              ;
 37787 00003D3C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37788 00003D3D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37789 00003D3F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37790 00003D42 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37791 00003D45 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37792 00003D46 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37793 00003D47 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37794 00003D49 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37795                                  
 37796                                  copy_error:
 37797                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37798 00003D4B F8                      	clc
 37799                                  copy_skip:
 37800 00003D4C 5F                              pop     di
 37801                                  ;copy_error:
 37802                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37803                                  	;clc                    ;
 37804 00003D4D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37805 00003D50 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37806                                  
 37807                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37808                                  
 37809                                  copy_line:
 37810 00003D52 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37811 00003D54 47                              inc     di              ;
 37812 00003D55 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37813 00003D57 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37814 00003D59 2E803E[A914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37815 00003D5F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37816 00003D61 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37817 00003D64 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37818 00003D66 47                              inc     di              ;
 37819 00003D67 47                              inc     di              ;
 37820 00003D68 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37821                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37822 00003D6A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37823 00003D6D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37824 00003D6F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37825 00003D71 47                              inc     di              ;
 37826                                  copy_next:
 37827 00003D72 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37828 00003D74 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37829                                  
 37830                                  copy_nextline:
 37831 00003D76 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37832 00003D79 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37833                                  
 37834                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37835                                  ;copy_done:
 37836                                          ;retn
 37837                                  
 37838                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37839                                  ;
 37840                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37841                                  ;
 37842                                  ;   INPUT
 37843                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37844                                  ;
 37845                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37846                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37847                                  ;
 37848                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37849                                  ;       DX
 37850                                  ;
 37851                                  ;   NOTES
 37852                                  ;       None
 37853                                  ;
 37854                                  ;   HISTORY
 37855                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37856                                  ;
 37857                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37858                                  
 37859                                  get_linenum:
 37860 00003D7B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37861 00003D7C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37862 00003D7E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37863 00003D7F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37864 00003D81 56                              push    si              ;
 37865 00003D82 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37866 00003D87 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37867                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37868 00003D89 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37869 00003D8C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37870 00003D8E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37871 00003D8F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37872 00003D91 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37873                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37874 00003D93 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37875 00003D94 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37876 00003D95 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37877 00003D96 C3                              retn
 37878                                  
 37879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37880                                  ;
 37881                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37882                                  ;
 37883                                  ;   INPUT
 37884                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37885                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37886                                  ;
 37887                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37888                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37889                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37890                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37891                                  ;
 37892                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37893                                  ;       None
 37894                                  ;
 37895                                  ;   NOTES
 37896                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37897                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37898                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37899                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37900                                  ;
 37901                                  ;   HISTORY
 37902                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37903                                  ;
 37904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37905                                  
 37906                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37907 00003D97 50                              push    ax              ;
 37908 00003D98 51                              push    cx              ;
 37909 00003D99 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37910 00003D9E 56                              push    si              ;
 37911 00003D9F 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37912 00003DA1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37913 00003DA2 06                              push    es              ;
 37914 00003DA3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37915 00003DA4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37916 00003DA7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37917 00003DA9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37918 00003DAB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37919 00003DAC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37920 00003DAD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37921 00003DAE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37922                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37923 00003DAF C3                              retn			;
 37924                                  
 37925                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37926                                  ;
 37927                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37928                                  ;
 37929                                  ;   INPUT
 37930                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37931                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37932                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37933                                  ;
 37934                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37935                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37936                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37937                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37938                                  ;
 37939                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37940                                  ;       AX
 37941                                  ;
 37942                                  ;   NOTES
 37943                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37944                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37945                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37946                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37947                                  ;
 37948                                  ;   HISTORY
 37949                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37950                                  ;
 37951                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37952                                  
 37953                                  find_block:
 37954 00003DB0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37955 00003DB3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37956 00003DB5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37957 00003DB7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37958 00003DB9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37959 00003DBB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37960 00003DBD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37961 00003DBF 2E800E[A914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37962 00003DC5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37963                                  check_line:
 37964 00003DC7 2E800E[A914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37965 00003DCD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37966 00003DD0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37967                                  next_line:
 37968 00003DD2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37969 00003DD5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37970                                  ;find_exit:
 37971                                  ;	retn
 37972                                  
 37973                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37974                                  ;
 37975                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37976                                  ;
 37977                                  ;   INPUT
 37978                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37979                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37980                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37981                                  ;
 37982                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37983                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37984                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37985                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37986                                  ;
 37987                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37988                                  ;       AX
 37989                                  ;
 37990                                  ;   NOTES
 37991                                  ;       None
 37992                                  ;
 37993                                  ;   HISTORY
 37994                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37995                                  ;
 37996                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37997                                  
 37998                                  comp_names:
 37999 00003DD7 57                              push    di              ;
 38000                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 38001 00003DD8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 38002 00003DDB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 38003 00003DDD E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 38004 00003DE0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 38005 00003DE2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 38006 00003DE4 47                              inc     di              ;
 38007 00003DE5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 38008                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 38009 00003DE8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 38010 00003DEA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 38011 00003DEC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 38012                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 38013 00003DED 5F                              pop     di              ;
 38014 00003DEE C3                              retn			;
 38015                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 38016 00003DEF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 38017 00003DF1 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 38018 00003DF4 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 38019 00003DF6 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 38020                                  
 38021                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38022                                  
 38023                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38024                                  comp_names_x:
 38025                                  	;
 38026                                  comp_names_safe:
 38027 00003DF8 50                              push    ax
 38028 00003DF9 51                              push    cx
 38029 00003DFA 56                              push	si
 38030 00003DFB 1E                              push    ds
 38031 00003DFC 0E                              push    cs
 38032 00003DFD 1F                              pop     ds
 38033 00003DFE E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 38034 00003E01 1F                              pop     ds
 38035 00003E02 5E                      	pop	si
 38036 00003E03 59                              pop     cx
 38037 00003E04 58                              pop     ax
 38038 00003E05 C3                              retn
 38039                                  
 38040                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38041                                  ;
 38042                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 38043                                  ;
 38044                                  ;   INPUT
 38045                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 38046                                  ;
 38047                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38048                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 38049                                  ;
 38050                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38051                                  ;       None
 38052                                  ;
 38053                                  ;   NOTES
 38054                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 38055                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 38056                                  ;
 38057                                  ;   HISTORY
 38058                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38059                                  ;
 38060                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38061                                  
 38062                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38063                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 38064                                  
 38065                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 38066 00003E06 50                              push    ax              ;
 38067 00003E07 53                              push    bx              ;
 38068 00003E08 51                              push    cx              ;
 38069 00003E09 52                              push    dx              ;
 38070 00003E0A 56                              push    si              ;
 38071 00003E0B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38072 00003E0D 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 38073 00003E11 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 38074 00003E13 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38075 00003E14 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38076 00003E16 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 38077 00003E18 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 38078 00003E1B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 38079 00003E1D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 38080 00003E1F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38081 00003E21 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 38082 00003E23 8A26[EA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 38083 00003E27 3A1E[F446]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 38084 00003E2B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38085 00003E2D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 38086 00003E30 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 38087 00003E32 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 38088 00003E34 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 38089 00003E36 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 38090 00003E38 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38091 00003E3A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 38092                                  print_other:                    ;
 38093 00003E3D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 38094 00003E3F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 38095 00003E41 8BBF[1847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 38096 00003E45 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 38097 00003E47 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 38098 00003E4B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 38099 00003E4D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 38100 00003E50 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38101 00003E52 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38102 00003E54 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38103 00003E56 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38104                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 38105 00003E58 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 38106 00003E5B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 38107 00003E5D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38108 00003E5F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38109 00003E61 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38110                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 38111 00003E63 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 38112 00003E66 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 38113 00003E68 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38114 00003E6A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38115 00003E6C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38116 00003E6E 06                              push    es              ;
 38117                                  print_loop:                     ;
 38118 00003E6F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 38119 00003E72 47                              inc     di              ;
 38120 00003E73 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 38121 00003E75 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 38122 00003E77 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 38123                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 38124 00003E79 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 38125 00003E7B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 38126 00003E7D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 38127 00003E7F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 38128 00003E81 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 38129 00003E83 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38130 00003E85 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38131 00003E87 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 38132 00003E8A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 38133 00003E8C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38134 00003E8E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38135 00003E90 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 38136                                  print_done:                     ;
 38137 00003E92 07                              pop     es              ;
 38138 00003E93 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38139 00003E94 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38140 00003E96 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 38141 00003E98 5E                              pop     si              ;
 38142 00003E99 5A                              pop     dx              ;
