 38143 00003E9A 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38144 00003E9B 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38145 00003E9C 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38146 00003E9D C3                              retn			;
 38147                                  
 38148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38149                                  ;
 38150                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 38151                                  ;
 38152                                  ;   INPUT
 38153                                  ;       None
 38154                                  ;
 38155                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38156                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 38157                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 38158                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 38159                                  ;
 38160                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38161                                  ;       None
 38162                                  ;
 38163                                  ;   NOTES
 38164                                  ;       None
 38165                                  ;
 38166                                  ;   HISTORY
 38167                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38168                                  ;
 38169                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38170                                  
 38171                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 38172 00003E9E 8A1E[F446]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 38173 00003EA2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38174 00003EA4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 38175 00003EA7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 38176 00003EAA 803E[F846]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 38177 00003EAF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 38178 00003EB1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 38179 00003EB3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38180 00003EB5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 38181                                  check_time:
 38182 00003EB7 A0[F846]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 38183 00003EBA 2A06[F946]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 38184 00003EBE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 38185 00003EC0 800E[F346]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 38186 00003EC5 C606[F946]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 38187 00003ECA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 38188                                  show_time:
 38189 00003ECD 53                              push    bx              ;
 38190 00003ECE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 38191 00003ED0 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 38192 00003ED4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38193 00003ED6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38194 00003ED8 52                              push    dx              ;
 38195 00003ED9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 38196 00003EDC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38197 00003EDE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38198 00003EE0 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 38199 00003EE3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 38200 00003EE6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 38201 00003EE8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 38202 00003EE9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 38203 00003EEB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 38204 00003EED 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 38205 00003EEF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38206 00003EF1 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38207 00003EF3 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 38208 00003EF5 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 38209 00003EF7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38210 00003EF9 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38211 00003EFB CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 38212 00003EFD 5A                              pop     dx
 38213 00003EFE B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 38214 00003F00 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38215 00003F02 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38216                                  input_key:
 38217 00003F03 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 38218 00003F05 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 38219 00003F07 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38220 00003F09 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 38221 00003F0B 803E[F846]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 38222 00003F10 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 38223 00003F12 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 38224 00003F14 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 38225 00003F16 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 38226 00003F18 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 38227 00003F1A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 38228 00003F1C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 38229 00003F1E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 38230                                  got_time:
 38231 00003F20 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 38232 00003F22 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 38233 00003F24 0036[F946]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 38234 00003F28 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 38235                                  got_key:
 38236 00003F2A 50                              push    ax              ;
 38237 00003F2B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 38238 00003F2E 8706[F846]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 38239 00003F32 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 38240 00003F34 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 38241 00003F36 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 38242 00003F37 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38243 00003F3A 8B1E[EA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38244 00003F3E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 38245 00003F41 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 38246 00003F43 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 38247                                  
 38248                                  timeout_disabled:
 38249 00003F44 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38250 00003F45 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 38251 00003F47 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 38252 00003F49 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 38253 00003F4B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 38254                                  
 38255 00003F4D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 38256 00003F4F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 38257 00003F51 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 38258 00003F54 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 38259 00003F56 FE0E[F446]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38260 00003F5A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38261 00003F5D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 38262 00003F5F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 38263                                  not_up:
 38264 00003F61 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 38265 00003F63 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 38266 00003F65 3A1E[F546]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 38267 00003F69 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 38268 00003F6B FE06[F446]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38269 00003F6F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38270 00003F72 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 38271                                  print1: 
 38272 00003F73 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 38273                                  print2: 
 38274 00003F75 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 38275 00003F78 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 38276                                  to_input_key:
 38277 00003F7B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 38278                                  not_down:
 38279 00003F7D F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38280 00003F82 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 38281 00003F84 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 38282 00003F86 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 38283 00003F88 8036[F346]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38284 00003F8D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 38285 00003F90 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 38286                                  not_f8:
 38287 00003F93 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 38288 00003F95 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 38289                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38290                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 38291                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 38292 00003F97 800E[F346]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 38293 00003F9C BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 38294 00003F9F B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 38295 00003FA1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 38296                                  
 38297                                  normal_key:
 38298 00003FA3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 38299 00003FA5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 38300 00003FA7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 38301 00003FA9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 38302 00003FAB BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 38303 00003FAE C3                              retn			;
 38304                                  not_backspace:
 38305 00003FAF 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 38306 00003FB1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 38307 00003FB3 3A06[F546]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 38308 00003FB7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 38309 00003FB9 A2[F446]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 38310 00003FBC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 38311 00003FBF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 38312 00003FC1 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 38313                                  
 38314                                  select_done:
 38315 00003FC3 B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 38316 00003FC5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38317 00003FC7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 38318                                  
 38319                                  	; fall into disp_input
 38320                                  
 38321                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38322                                  
 38323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38324                                  ;
 38325                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 38326                                  ;
 38327                                  ;   INPUT
 38328                                  ;       AL == character to display
 38329                                  ;
 38330                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38331                                  ;       None
 38332                                  ;
 38333                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38334                                  ;       None
 38335                                  ;
 38336                                  ;   NOTES
 38337                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 38338                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 38339                                  ;
 38340                                  ;   HISTORY
 38341                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38342                                  ;
 38343                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38344                                  
 38345                                  
 38346                                  disp_input:
 38347 00003FC9 50                      	push	ax
 38348                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 38349                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 38350                                  	;mov	al,' '
 38351                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 38352 00003FCA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 38353 00003FCC 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 38354 00003FCE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 38355                                  disp_ok:
 38356 00003FD0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 38357                                  disp_input_ok:
 38358 00003FD2 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38359 00003FD4 CD21                    	int	21h
 38360 00003FD6 BA[0E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 38361 00003FD9 E8E504                  	call	print
 38362 00003FDC 58                      	pop	ax
 38363 00003FDD C3                      	retn
 38364                                  
 38365                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38366                                  
 38367                                  disp_num:
 38368 00003FDE 53                              push    bx
 38369 00003FDF 0430                            add     al,'0'
 38370 00003FE1 B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 38371 00003FE3 8B1E[EA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38372 00003FE7 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 38373 00003FEA CD10                            int     10h
 38374 00003FEC 5B                              pop     bx
 38375 00003FED C3                              retn
 38376                                  
 38377                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38378                                  ;
 38379                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 38380                                  ;
 38381                                  ;   INPUT
 38382                                  ;       None
 38383                                  ;
 38384                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38385                                  ;       None
 38386                                  ;
 38387                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38388                                  ;       None
 38389                                  ;
 38390                                  ;   NOTES
 38391                                  ;       None
 38392                                  ;
 38393                                  ;   HISTORY
 38394                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38395                                  ;
 38396                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38397                                  
 38398                                  show_status:
 38399 00003FEE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 38400 00003FEF 8B1E[EA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38401 00003FF3 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38402 00003FF5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38403 00003FF7 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38404 00003FF8 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38405 00003FFA 8B16[ED46]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 38406 00003FFE F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38407 00004003 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 38408 00004005 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 38409 00004007 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38410 00004009 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38411 0000400C B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 38412                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38413                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 38414 0000400F EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 38415                                  show_onoff: 
 38416 00004011 CD10                            int     10h
 38417                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 38418                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 38419                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 38420                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 38421                                  
 38422 00004013 A0[AC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 38423 00004016 803E[F346]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 38424 0000401B 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 38425 0000401D A0[A84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 38426                                  show_noton:                     ;
 38427 00004020 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 38428                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 38429 00004022 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38430                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 38431 00004024 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38432 00004025 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38433 00004027 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 38434 00004029 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38435 0000402A C3                              retn			;
 38436                                  
 38437                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38438                                  
 38439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38440                                  ;
 38441                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 38442                                  ;
 38443                                  ;   INPUT
 38444                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38445                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38446                                  ;
 38447                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38448                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 38449                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 38450                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 38451                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38452                                  ;
 38453                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38454                                  ;       AX
 38455                                  ;
 38456                                  ;   NOTES
 38457                                  ;       None
 38458                                  ;
 38459                                  ;   HISTORY
 38460                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38461                                  ;
 38462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38463                                  
 38464                                  skip_token:
 38465 0000402B E84D00                          call    get_char
 38466 0000402E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 38467 00004030 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 38468 00004033 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 38469                                  skip_check_eol:
 38470 00004035 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 38471 00004037 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38472 00004039 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38473 0000403B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38474 0000403D F8                              clc
 38475                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 38476 0000403E C3                      	retn
 38477                                  skip_token_eol:
 38478 0000403F F9                              stc
 38479                                  skip_token_done:
 38480 00004040 C3                              retn
 38481                                  
 38482                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38483                                  ;
 38484                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 38485                                  ;
 38486                                  ;   INPUT
 38487                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38488                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38489                                  ;
 38490                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38491                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38492                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 38493                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 38494                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38495                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 38496                                  ;
 38497                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38498                                  ;       AX
 38499                                  ;
 38500                                  ;   NOTES
 38501                                  ;       None
 38502                                  ;
 38503                                  ;   HISTORY
 38504                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38505                                  ;
 38506                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38507                                  
 38508                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 38509 00004041 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 38510 00004044 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 38511 00004047 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 38512 00004049 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 38513 0000404C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 38514 0000404E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 38515                                  
 38516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38517                                  ;
 38518                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 38519                                  ;
 38520                                  ;   INPUT
 38521                                  ;       AL == last character read
 38522                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38523                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38524                                  ;
 38525                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38526                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38527                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 38528                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38529                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38530                                  ;
 38531                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38532                                  ;       AX
 38533                                  ;
 38534                                  ;   NOTES
 38535                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 38536                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 38537                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 38538                                  ;
 38539                                  ;   HISTORY
 38540                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38541                                  ;
 38542                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38543                                  
 38544                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38545                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 38546                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38547                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 38548                                       
 38549                                  	; fall into skip_line
 38550                                  
 38551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38552                                  ;
 38553                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 38554                                  ;
 38555                                  ;   INPUT
 38556                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38557                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38558                                  ;
 38559                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38560                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38561                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38562                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38563                                  ;
 38564                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38565                                  ;       AX
 38566                                  ;
 38567                                  ;   NOTES
 38568                                  ;       None
 38569                                  ;
 38570                                  ;   HISTORY
 38571                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38572                                  ;
 38573                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38574                                  
 38575                                  skip_line:
 38576 00004050 E82800                          call    get_char
 38577 00004053 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 38578                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38579 00004055 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38580 00004057 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 38581                                  skip_line_done:
 38582                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38583 00004059 C3                              retn

 38585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38586                                  ;
 38587                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 38588                                  ;
 38589                                  ;   INPUT
 38590                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38591                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38592                                  ;
 38593                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38594                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 38595                                  ;       BX == binary #
 38596                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 38597                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38598                                  ;
 38599                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38600                                  ;       AX
 38601                                  ;
 38602                                  ;   NOTES
 38603                                  ;       None
 38604                                  ;
 38605                                  ;   HISTORY
 38606                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38607                                  ;
 38608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38609                                  
 38610                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38611                                  
 38612                                  get_number:
 38613 0000405A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38614                                  num_loop:
 38615 0000405C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38616 0000405F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38617 00004061 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38618 00004063 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38619 00004065 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38620 00004067 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38621 00004069 50                              push    ax              ;
 38622 0000406A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38623 0000406D 52                              push    dx              ;
 38624 0000406E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38625 00004070 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38626 00004071 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38627 00004073 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38628 00004074 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38629 00004076 98                              cbw                     ;
 38630 00004077 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38631 00004079 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38632                                  
 38633                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38634                                  ;num_done:
 38635                                          ;retn

 38637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38638                                  ;
 38639                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38640                                  ;
 38641                                  ;   INPUT
 38642                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38643                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38644                                  ;
 38645                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38646                                  ;       AL == next character
 38647                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38648                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38649                                  ;
 38650                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38651                                  ;       AX
 38652                                  ;
 38653                                  ;   NOTES
 38654                                  ;       None
 38655                                  ;
 38656                                  ;   HISTORY
 38657                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38658                                  ;
 38659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38660                                  
 38661                                  get_char:
 38662 0000407B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38663 0000407E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38664                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38665 00004080 26                      	es	
 38666 00004081 AC                      	lodsb
 38667 00004082 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38668 00004084 C3                              retn			;
 38669                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38670 00004085 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38671                                  nearby_ret:
 38672 00004088 C3                              retn

 38674                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38675                                  ;
 38676                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38677                                  ;
 38678                                  ;   INPUT
 38679                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38680                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38681                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38682                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38683                                  ;
 38684                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38685                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38686                                  ;
 38687                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38688                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38689                                  ;
 38690                                  ;   NOTES
 38691                                  ;       None
 38692                                  ;
 38693                                  ;   HISTORY
 38694                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38695                                  ;
 38696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38697                                  
 38698                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38699                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38700                                  
 38701                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38702                                  query_user:
 38703 00004089 F606[F346]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38704                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38705 0000408E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38706 00004090 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38707                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38708                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38709                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38710                                  qu_1:
 38711 00004093 F606[F346]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38712 00004098 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38713 0000409A 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38714 0000409B A0[A814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38715 0000409E F606[F346]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38716 000040A3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38717 000040A5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38718                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38719 000040A7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38720                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38721                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38722                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0

 38728                                  query_all:
 38729                                  
 38730                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38731                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38732                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38733                                  
 38734 000040AB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38735 000040AC BA[024D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38736 000040AF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38737 000040B1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38738                                  
 38739 000040B3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38740 000040B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38741 000040B7 BF[4047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38742                                  find_match:                             ;
 38743 000040BA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38744 000040BC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38745 000040BE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38746 000040C0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38747 000040C1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38748 000040C3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38749 000040C5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38750                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38751 000040C8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38752                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38753 000040CA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38754 000040CD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38755 000040CF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38756                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38757 000040D1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38758 000040D3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38759 000040D4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38760 000040D6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38761 000040D8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38762 000040DA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38763 000040DC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38764 000040DF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38765 000040E1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38766                                  cmd_notset:
 38767 000040E3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38768                                  line_print:                             ;
 38769                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38770 000040E5 26                              es
 38771 000040E6 AC                      	lodsb
 38772 000040E7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38773 000040E9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38774 000040EB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38775                                  non_null:                               ;
 38776 000040ED 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38777 000040EF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38778 000040F1 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38779                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38780 000040F3 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38781                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38782 000040F6 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38783                                  non_space:                              ;
 38784 000040F8 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38785 000040FA B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38786 000040FC CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38787 000040FE EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38788                                  
 38789                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38790 00004100 BA[A04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38791                                  
 38792                                  generic_prompt:
 38793 00004103 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38794                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38795 00004106 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38796 00004108 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38797 0000410A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38798 0000410C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38799 0000410E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38800 00004111 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38801 00004113 A0[AC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38802 00004116 800E[F346]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38803 0000411B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38804                                  not_func:
 38805 0000411D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38806 0000411F 3A06[AC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38807 00004123 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38808 00004125 3A06[A84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38809 00004129 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38810 0000412B 803E[A814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38811 00004130 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38812 00004132 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38813 00004134 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38814 00004136 800E[F346]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38815 0000413B A0[A84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38816                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38817 0000413E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38818 00004141 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38819                                  
 38820 00004142 3A06[AC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38821 00004146 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38822                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38823 00004148 F8                      	clc
 38824                                  do_cmd:
 38825 00004149 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38826                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38827                                  	; cf=0
 38828                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38829 0000414A C3                      	retn
 38830                                  
 38831                                  skip_cmd:
 38832 0000414B 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38833                                  skip_all:

 38835 0000414E F9                      	stc
 38836 0000414F C3                      	retn

 38893                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38894                                  
 38895                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38896                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38897                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38898                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38899                                  
 38900                                  disable_autoexec:
 38901                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38902                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38903                                  
 38904 00004184 F606[F346]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38905 00004189 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38906 0000418B F606[E946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38907 00004190 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38908 00004192 800E[E946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38909                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38910 00004197 810E[F346]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38911 0000419D BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38912                                  dae_1:
 38913                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38914 000041A0 A0[2846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38915                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38916 000041A3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38917 000041A5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38918 000041A7 8A1E[2946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38919 000041AB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38920 000041AD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38921 000041AF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38922 000041B2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38923 000041B5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38924 000041B7 881E[2946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38925 000041BB 81C3[2A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38926 000041BF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38927                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38928 000041C0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38929 000041C3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38930 000041C5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;

 38936                                  disable_exit:                           ;

 39000 0000420D 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 39001 0000420F 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'

 39004

 39024                                  
 39025                                  newline:

 39077                                  ; 
 39078                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 39079                                  ;
 39080                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39081                                  
 39082                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39083                                  
 39084                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39085                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)

 39089 00004235 1E                      	push	ds
 39090                                  
 39091 00004236 06                      	push	es
 39092 00004237 1F                      	pop	ds
 39093                                  
 39094                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39095                                  
 39096                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39097                                  
 39098                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39099 00004238 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 39100                                  ;else
 39101                                  ;	xor	si,si
 39102                                  ;endif
 39103                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39104                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39105                                  	;xor	si, si
 39106                                  
 39107                                  convloop:
 39108 0000423A AC                      	lodsb
 39109 0000423B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 39110 0000423D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 39111 0000423F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 39112 00004241 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 39113 00004243 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 39114 00004245 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 39115                                  noconv:
 39116                                  
 39117                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39118                                  
 39119                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39120                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39121                                  
 39122                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 39123                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 39124                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 39125                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 39126                                  ;
 39127 00004248 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 39128 0000424B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 39129 0000424D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 39130 0000424F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 39131                                  check_eol:
 39132 00004251 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 39133 00004253 7406                    	je	short convdone
 39134 00004255 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 39135 00004257 7402                    	je	short convdone
 39136                                  ;endif
 39137                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39138 00004259 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 39139                                  convdone:
 39140 0000425B 1F                      	pop	ds
 39141 0000425C 5E                      	pop	si
 39142 0000425D 59                      	pop	cx
 39143 0000425E C3                      	retn

 39261                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39262                                  ;
 39263                                  ; procedure : getnum
 39264                                  ;
 39265                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 39266                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 39267                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 39268                                  ;
 39269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39270                                  
 39271                                  getnum:
 39272 000042D2 53                      	push	bx
 39273 000042D3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 39274                                  b2:
 39275 000042D5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 39276 000042D8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 39277                                  
 39278 000042DA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 39279 000042DB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 39280                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 39281                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39282 000042DC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 39283 000042DE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 39284 000042E0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 39285 000042E1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 39286 000042E3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 39287 000042E6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 39288                                  
 39289 000042E8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 39290                                  
 39291 000042E9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 39292 000042EC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 39293 000042EE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 39294 000042F0 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 39295 000042F2 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 39296 000042F4 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 39297 000042F6 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 39298 000042F8 7417                    	je	short b15
 39299 000042FA 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 39300 000042FF 7410                    	je	short b15
 39301 00004301 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 39302                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39303                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39304                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 39305                                  	;nop
 39306 00004303 740C                    	je	short b15
 39307 00004305 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 39308 00004307 7408                    	je	short b15
 39309 00004309 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 39310 0000430B 7404                    	je	short b15
 39311 0000430D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 39312 0000430F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 39313                                  b15:
 39314 00004311 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 39315 00004316 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 39316                                  b1:
 39317 0000431B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 39318 0000431D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 39319 0000431F 5B                      	pop	bx
 39320 00004320 C3                      	retn
 39321                                  badnum:
 39322                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39323                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 39324 00004321 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 39325                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 39326 00004323 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 39327 00004327 5B                      	pop	bx
 39328 00004328 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 39329 00004329 C3                      	retn

 39332                                  
 39333                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 39334                                  
 39335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39336                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 39337                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 39338                                  ;	si = 0
 39339                                  ;	ax = country id
 39340                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 39341                                  ;	bx = file handle
 39342                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 39343                                  ;
 39344                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 39345                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 39346                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 39347                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 39348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39349                                  
 39350                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39351                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 39352                                  
 39353                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39354                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 39355                                  
 39356 0000432A 57                      	push	di
 39357 0000432B 50                      	push	ax

 39359                                  
 39360 0000432D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 39361 0000432F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx

 39363 00004334 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 39364 00004337 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39365

 39368

 39379

 39381 0000434C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 39382 0000434F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 39383                                  
 39384 00004351 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 39385 00004352 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 39386 00004354 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 39387 00004357 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 39388 0000435A E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 39389 0000435D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 39397 00004369 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 39398 0000436A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 39399 0000436B 5F                      	pop	di
 39400                                  
 39401                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 39402 0000436C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 39403 0000436F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 39404                                  
 39405                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 39406                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 39407                                  	; 10/09/2023

 39411 00004378 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 39412

 39418

 39422                                  setdoscntry_fail:

 39596                                  getcountrydestination:
 39597                                  
 39598                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39599                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 39600                                  ;
 39601                                  ;input: al - data id
 39602                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39603                                  ;on return:
 39604                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39605                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39607                                  
 39608                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39609                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39610                                  
 39611                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39612                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39613                                  
 39614 0000444F 51                      	push	cx
 39615                                  	;add	di,74
 39616 00004450 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 39617                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 39618 00004453 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 39619 00004456 47                      	inc	di
 39620 00004457 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 39621                                  
 39622                                  getcntrydest:

 39624 0000445B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 39625                                  
 39626 0000445D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 39627 00004461 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 39628                                  
 39629 00004463 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 39630 00004466 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 39631                                  
 39632                                  getcntrydest_1:
 39633                                  	;add	di,41
 39634 00004468 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 39635                                  getcntrydest_loop:

 39637 0000446D F9                      	stc
 39638                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 39639                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 39640                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39641 0000446E 59                      	pop	cx
 39642 0000446F C3                      	retn
 39643                                  
 39644                                  getcntrydest_ok:

 39666                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39667                                  
 39668                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39669                                  
 39670                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39671                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39672                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39673                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39674                                  ;
 39675                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39676                                  ;	 be moved.
 39677                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39678                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39679                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39680                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39681                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39682                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39684                                  
 39685 0000447A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39686 0000447B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39687 0000447E F9                      	stc
 39688 0000447F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39689 00004481 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39690 00004482 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39691                                  
 39692 00004484 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39693 00004486 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39694 00004488 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39695 0000448A F9                      	stc
 39696 0000448B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39697                                  ricb_exit:
 39698 0000448D C3                      	retn
 39699

 39702                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !

 39705                                  
 39706                                  set_country_path:
 39707                                  
 39708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39709                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39710                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39711                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39712                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39713                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39714                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39715                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39716                                  
 39717                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39718                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39719                                  
 39720                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39721                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39722                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39723                                  
 39724                                  	push	si
 39725                                  
 39726                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39727                                  	push	es
 39728                                  	pop	ds
 39729                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39730                                  
 39731                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39732                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39733                                  
 39734                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39735                                  	inc	si
 39736                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39737                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39738                                  
 39739                                  scp_default_drv:
 39740                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39741                                  	int	21h
 39742                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39743                                  
 39744                                  scp_setdrv:
 39745                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39746                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39747                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39748                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39749                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39750                                  
 39751                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39752                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39753                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39754                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39755                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39756                                  
 39757                                  scp_root_dir:
 39758                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39759                                  scp_path:
 39760                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39761                                  
 39762                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39763                                  scpath_exit:
 39764                                  
 39765                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39766                                  	push	es
 39767                                  	pop	ds
 39768                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39769                                  
 39770                                  	pop	si
 39771                                  	retn
 39772                                  
 39773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39774                                  
 39775                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39776                                  
 39777                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39778                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39779                                  ;carry set if not.
 39780                                  
 39781                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39782                                  
 39783                                  	push	ax
 39784                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39785                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39786                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39787                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39788                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39789                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39790                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39791                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39792                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39793                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39794                                  
 39795                                  cdletter_no:
 39796                                  	stc
 39797                                  cdletter_exit:
 39798                                  	pop	ax
 39799                                  	retn
 39800                                  
 39801                                  %endif
